description.hltext_display: 再战明天：加拿大公布CPI 英国发MPC会议记录
description.content:
1日)内地股市上扬，港股高开72点，在中资股带动下升幅显著扩阔，午后大市进一步攀升，一度重上二万三，最高见23025点，惟最终受制于十天线(约在23017点)，全日恒指收升354点或1?6%，收报22993点。国指收报12607点，升198点或1?6%。全日主板成交599?5亿元。
明天(22日)维创数码(00751)除净，派中期息5仙、可以股代息。此外，华润创业(00291)、时富金融(00510)、华润燃气(01193)、富士康(02038)将于明天举行股东会；中海油服(02883)则在中国举行股东会。

美国方面，今晚将公布美国ICSC?高盛连锁店销售数字、美国Redbook连锁店销售数字；加拿大则公布CPI.
欧洲方面，英国央行将于明天发布12月8至9日，货币政策委员会(MPC)会议记录，以及就量化宽松政策之投票结果。此外，英国将公布国内生产总值(GDP)、经常帐数据，德国则公布进口物价数据，及意大利公布消费者信心指数

description.hltext_display: Descienden las alzas de salario en Latinoam�rica
description.content:
santiago de chile/EFE — Los aumentos salariales en América Latina mostraron una tendencia descendente en los últimos tres años debido a la crisis económica, al pasar de una subida real del 3,3% en 2007 al 1,9% en 2008 y al 2,2% en 2009, informó ayer en Santiago la Organización Internacional del Trabajo (OIT).
En el periodo previo a la crisis, entre 2004 y 2007, las remuneraciones medias reales promedio de la región crecieron un 1,2% al año, de acuerdo al Informe Mundial de Salarios 2010/2011 divulgado ayer por la OIT.
En el conjunto del mundo, la crisis económica también ha reducido casi a la mitad las subidas salariales, al pasar de un aumento medio del sueldo real del 2,8% en 2007, al 1,5% en 2008 y al 1,6% en 2009.
En la última década, desde el año 1999, los salarios en América Latina y el Caribe acumularon una subida del 12,4% en 2008 y del 14,8% en 2009, según los datos dados a conocer en el marco de la XVII Reunión Regional de la OIT.
Al analizar los aumentos nominales del salario mínimo en 2009, Honduras lidera las subidas en la región, con un incremento del 100% frente a una inflación del 10,8% durante el periodo de vigencia del sueldo base anterior.
También destaca la subida decretada en Brasil, con un aumento del 12% frente a una inflación del 5,4%.
Sin embargo, el informe señala que estos incrementos "continúan siendo una excepción en América Latina".
"La mayoría de países optó por ajustes que coinciden estrechamente con las cifras de la inflación pasada, manteniéndose así el poder adquisitivo de los trabajadores con salario mínimo sin aumentar la carga a empresas durante este período difícil", añade.

description.hltext_display: Waterbury traffic light upgrade explodes into debate
description.content:
WATERBURY -- What began as a simple traffic light upgrade at a Highland Avenue corner has exploded into a public debate over what constitutes a straight line in Town Plot.
Traffic engineers, including the experts hired by the city, argue that "straight" is a geometric or directional idea, and that the names of the roads on that straight line simply don't matter.
To somebody like Mark Pronovost, the city engineer, that means New Haven Avenue and the north leg of Highland Avenue are simply two sections of the same straight line.
That is why engineers changed the light phasing at the corners to give motorists heading south on Highland and north on New Haven a green light at the same time. To them, it's a straight line.

" Here's another one for you...I know a double, solid middle line means 'do not pass' and a dotted line means 'pass'. So what does a long Italian flag line mean?? "
someone wrote on Dec 20, 2010 9:13 AM:
" i wish that i knew of this and could have taped this meeting. for the people who design and maintain the waterbury traffic control system to call themselves engineers is amazing. i have never seen a more poorly setup traffic control system in my life. it is no wonder they dont grasp the idea of a straight line. lights are supposed to be put in place to control traffic, in waterbury they are to impede traffic. i have never seen a town with more lights go green directly into a red light. which blocks the intersection behind it. these guys all need to be dismissed and have the jr. high kids do their job. "

description.hltext_display: Payız mövsümündə Bakıda və onun ətrafında 2 milyonadək ağac və kol bitkisi əkilib
description.content:
Azərbaycan, Bakı, 22 dekabr /Trend, müxbir M.Əliyev/
Ekologiya və Təbii Sərvətlər Nazirliyi payız mövsümündə Bakıda və onun ətrafında 2 milyonadək ağac və kol bitkisi əkib. Bu barədə Trend-ə çərşənbə günü nazirliyin mətbuat xidmətinin rəhbəri İradə İbrahimova məlumat verib.
Ümumilikdə, payız mövsümündə Azərbaycanda 4 843 000-dən artıq ağac və kol əkilib.
Azərbaycan Prezidenti İlham Əliyevin Bakı və onun ətrafında 3 milyon ağacın əkilməsi barədə təşəbbüsü ilə əlaqədar 2009-cu ildən başlayaraq genişmiqyaslı tədbirlər həyata keçirilir.
Ekologiya və Təbii Sərvətlər Nazirliyinin Meşə Mühafizəsi və Bərpası Müəssisələrinin əməkdaşları tərəfindən dövlət meşə fondunun torpaqlarında isə heç bir əlavə vəsait xərclənmədən, nazirliyin daxili imkanları hesabına 114 hektar sahədə 290 560 ədəd müxtəlif ağac əkilib. Əkilən ağaclar müəssisənin tinglik sahələrində yetişdirilib.

description.hltext_display: Иван Богданов: Дума Ставрополя умеет решать «горячие вопросы»
description.content:
В уходящем 2010 году одним из значимых событий для жителей краевого центра стал инициированный партией «Единая Россия» капитальный ремонт 17 городских магистралей. О том, как удалось осуществить этот и другие масштабные проекты, рассказывает заместитель председателя Ставропольской городской Думы, руководитель фракции всероссийской политической партии «Единая Россия» Иван Богданов.
– Иван Васильевич, не возникает ли искушение, используя пост вице-спикера, лоббировать интересы фракции?
- Прежде всего хочу сказать, что фракция «Единой России» самая многочисленная в Ставропольской городской Думе, насчитывающая 32 депутата, и потому не нуждается в лоббировании своих интересов. Но ответственность велика: от нашей фракции во многом зависит качество принимаемых нормативных актов, и потому от каждого депутата-единоросса требуется принятие взвешенных решений.
У меня, как у заместителя председателя городской Думы и руководителя фракции, есть уникальная возможность выстраивать конструктивный диалог с координаторами других политических партий и оперативно принимать решения по различным «горячим вопросам». Избавиться таким образом от волокиты и не замотать проблему различными согласованиями и обсуждениями во фракциях и комитетах. К примеру, будучи депутатом Гордумы предыдущего созыва, которая состояла из депутатов, избранных в одномандатных округах, видел, как многие актуальные вопросы в силу разных причин решались очень долго. Теперь ситуация изменилась. На заседании фракции рассматриваем подготовленный профильным комитетом проект решения, и надо отметить, что дебаты между однопартийцами порой идут очень бурные, но на заседании Думы мы голосуем консолидированно. По такому принципу построена работа и в других фракциях, что также положительно влияет на рабочий процесс. В качестве примера оперативной работы думцев можно привести ситуацию, связанную с капитальным ремонтом аварийных школ №17, 13 и 42. Данные образовательные учреждения находились в катастрофическом состоянии, но в городской казне средств на их капремонт не было. Тогда по инициативе депутатов нашей фракции состоялось внеочередное заседание Думы, на котором было решено направить на ремонт школ дополнительные доходы бюджета. Кроме того, часть денег поступила из средств, выделяемых депутатам из фракции «Единой России» на выполнение наказов избирателей. В итоге благодаря деловому подходу всех фракций три школы Ставрополя капитально отремонтированы.
– Кстати, если разговор зашел о проектах, инициированных партией «Единая Россия», расскажите более подробно о капитальном ремонте 17 дорог в Ставрополе.
- Весной нынешнего года, когда сошел снег и стало ясно, в каком плачевном состоянии оказались дороги краевого центра, на заседании фракции решили: нужно заниматься не только ямочным ремонтом, но и максимально сосредоточить все усилия на капитальном ремонте дорог. Из-за ограниченности средств городского бюджета решено было капитально отремонтировать только Чапаевский проезд и улицы Голенева, Народную и Булкина и привести в порядок не только проезжую часть, но и тротуары, остановочные павильоны, бордюры, ливневую канализацию. Благодаря поддержке губернатора Ставропольского края Валерия Гаевского и депутатов Государственной Думы РФ, входящих во фракцию «Единой России», наш план включили во всероссийский партийный проект «Новые дороги городов России», и к четырем улицам добавились еще 13. На капитальный ремонт дорог краевого центра из федерального бюджета было выделено 360 млн рублей. Еще 20 млн рублей поступило из бюджета города.
Почти три месяца дорожные службы трудились в усиленном режиме: укладывали асфальт, устанавливали новые бордюры, ремонтировали ливневые канализации, наносили разметку. Большая часть работ проводилась в вечернее и ночное время, а также в выходные дни, чтобы максимально снизить неудобства для горожан. Было уложено около 350 тысяч тонн асфальтобетона. Строительство велось с использованием современных технологий производства работ «ресайклер», применением инновационных материалов – щебеночно-мастичного асфальтобетона и геосетки, которые на долгое время обеспечат стойкость покрытия. 17 транспортных артерий города общей площадью 391702 тыс. кв. метров получили современное асфальтобетонное покрытие, выполненное с соблюдением всех норм и стандартов.
Следует отметить, что на этом значимом для города проекте действие федеральной программы «Новые дороги городов России» не заканчивается. Уже в будущем году на строительство и ремонт городских дорог из федерального центра планируется выделить 289 млн рублей. Из них 190 миллионов пойдут на ремонт внутридворовых проездов и окраинных улиц. Благодаря этому проекту в городе начнется масштабный ремонт внутри-квартальных дорог. Частично он проводился в рамках муниципальных программ «Мой двор» и «Окраина». За три года было отремонтировано 90 дворов. Однако потребность в разы больше – своего часа ждут еще более пятисот дворов. Поэтому решение партии «Единая Россия» выделить целевые средства на ремонт внутридворовых проездов и окраинных улиц позволит ускоренными темпами решить и эту проблему.
– Продолжая тему, скажите, какие еще проекты были инициированы членами фракции «Единой России» в Ставропольской городской Думе?
- Прежде всего это обновление муниципального автопарка новыми машинами. Активно реализуется рассчитанная на три года программа замены в многоквартирных домах изношенного лифтового оборудования. До конца года в Ставрополе на условиях софинансирования планируется замена 49 лифтов, которые уже отработали четверть века. Всего за три года произойдет замена более 160 лифтов.
Мы также активно проводим работу по регулированию рынка наружной рекламы. Вспомните, еще два года назад Ставрополь лидировал среди всех городов России по количеству рекламных щитов на душу населения. В 2008 году в городе насчитывалось около 1350 различных рекламных конструкций. Причем большое количество щитов было установлено с грубыми нарушениями. В результате совместной работы с администрацией города снесено около 250 рекламных щитов, которые не имели разрешительной документации или установлены с различными нарушениями. Только на проспекте Кулакова убрано 55 рекламных билбордов. Причем демонтаж проходил за счет рекламодателей. Кроме того, мы приняли новое положение о рекламе, которое запрещает установку крупногабаритных конструкций в центральной части города. К сожалению, еще много рекламных конструкций «украшают» Ставрополь, но демонтировать их можно будет только тогда, когда прекратят действовать выданные прежней администрацией разрешения.
Во многом благодаря усилиям депутатов из фракции «Единой России», курирующих конкретные проекты, в эксплуатацию введено много социально значимых объектов. Это и детский сад в 204-м квартале, и три пристройки к детским садам, что позволяет принять туда более шестисот ребятишек. В ближайшей перспективе завершится строительство еще одного детского сада и школы на 990 учащихся в военном городке 566-го жилого квартала, пристроек к детским садам № 51 и 75. Проводится реконструкция филиала поликлиники № 2 и капитальный ремонт детской поликлиники на улице Маршала Жукова. Модернизированы пищеблоки в школьных столовых, и сегодня дети получают полноценные горячие обеды, отличным дополнением к которым выступает молоко для учащихся начальных классов. Для ребят, увлекающихся футболом, недавно построена спортивно-тренировочная база «Кожаный мяч», организуются и проводятся различные соревнования. Главное, чтобы дети привыкли заниматься спортом и вести здоровый образ жизни.
– Иван Васильевич, в свете последних событий в Москве, Санкт-Петербурге, Ростове-на-Дону и у нас в Зеленокумске что предпринимается для обеспечения мира и согласия в нашем многонациональном городе?
- Проблема общественной безопасности сегодня является одной из самых первостепенных и уже давно вышла за рамки компетенции спецслужб и силовых структур. Для обеспечения общественного порядка и противодействия терроризму в городе действует целевая программа «Безопасный Ставрополь». Она рассчитана на 2010-2012 годы и предусматривает в том числе оснащение системами видеонаблюдения муниципальных учреждений образования и здравоохранения, а также мест отдыха горожан.
В нынешнем году на указанные цели было выделено более 25 млн рублей, что позволило установить на территории краевого центра более 400 камер видеонаблюдения и закупить оборудование для обработки и хранения информации. Под видео-контролем находятся школы, учреждения культуры и спорта. Завершается монтаж видеокамер на площади Ленина, Крепостной горе и у мемориала «Огонь вечной славы». В 2011 году соответствующие работы будут продолжаться и планируется еще установить около 600 видео-камер в детских садах, больницах и поликлиниках, на объектах жизнеобеспечения и транспорта.
Следить за общественным порядком милиционерам будут помогать сами горожане, объединенные в добровольную народную дружину Ставрополя. Ее работа будет основана на строгом соблюдении законности и тесном взаимодействии с органами местного самоуправления города и правоохранительными органами.
– Накануне Нового года принято строить планы на будущее. Каким вам видится бюджет следующего года?
- Недавно состоялись публичные слушания, посвященные бюджету будущего года. Проект, который представлен в Думу, бездефицитный и сбалансированный. В отличие от 2009 и 2010 годов бюджет имеет не только социальную, но и развивающую направленность. На таком варианте настояли депутаты. Мы получили возможность вернуться к адресной инвестиционной программе, новым масштабным стройкам, таким как дом для бюджетников. Планируется сдать в эксплуатацию здание детской хореографической школы и пристройку к детсаду № 77, капитально отремонтировать лицей № 35 и школу № 41.
Продолжится реализация ранее принятых муниципальных целевых программ и начнется выполнение новых. Одна из них – «Модернизация отрасли здравоохранения» с первоначальным объемом финансирования в сумме 42,9 млн рублей. На условиях софинансирования за счет федеральных, краевых и муниципальных средств будут продолжены программы по обеспечению жильем молодых семей, капитальному ремонту многоквартирных домов, переселению граждан из аварийного жилищного фонда. Существенно подрастут расходы на образование и здравоохранение, культуру, спорт и социальную поддержку, в том числе планируется увеличение заработной платы работников бюджетной сферы. Не обойдены вниманием и отрасли городского хозяйства. В проекте бюджета расходы по этим статьям планируется увеличить на 40 процентов, и коммунальщики получат около одного миллиарда рублей.
Впрочем, это только проект, и нам всем без исключения придется немало потрудиться, чтобы намеченные планы реализовались в полном объеме. Хочу также отметить, что многие вопросы, решение которых запланировано в ближайшем будущем, были поставлены депутатами по инициативе простых жителей города. Они – полноправные участники нормотворческого процесса. А значит, все позитивные дела, которые удалось завершить и которые намечены в наших планах, являются плодом нашей совместной работы со всеми неравнодушными ставропольцами.

description.hltext_display: Puerto Rico: 16 muertes por abuso dom�stico
description.content:
San Juan/INS — La Oficina de la Procuradora de las Mujeres (OPM) reveló ayer que en lo que va de año 16 mujeres han sido asesinadas por sus parejas o ex parejas, se han registrado 11,690 incidentes de violencia doméstica y se han solicitado 10,929 órdenes de protección.
Desde enero de 2000, 243 mujeres han sido asesinadas por sus compañeros o ex parejas.
La información fue revelada por Josefina Arroyo Mendoza, en representación de la procuradora de Asuntos de la Mujer, Ivonne Feliciano Acevedo, durante la vista pública de la Comisión de Educación y Asuntos de la Familia que se evalúa el Proyecto del Senado 1094, de la autoría de la legisladora Itzamar Peña Ramírez.
La medida ordena al Departamento de Educación, con la colaboración de la OPM, la Policía de Puerto Rico, el Departamento de la Familia y el Departamento de Justicia, a ofrecer dos adiestramientos por semestre a los padres o custodios de los estudiantes, cuya asistencia deberá ser compulsoria, sobre cómo evitar el maltrato de menores y la violencia doméstica y cómo fortalecer las relaciones de familia.
Feliciano Acevedo, que favoreció la pieza legislativa, señaló en una ponencia escrita que es apremiante detener la violencia que afecta a la familia y resulta necesario que el Estado y la sociedad civil se integren en el desarrollo de las nuevas herramientas para detener la violencia en la sociedad.
De acuerdo a Arroyo Mendoza, aunque se emitan las órdenes de protección, no necesariamente se protege a la víctima de un futuro incidente de violencia.

description.hltext_display: Couple denied zoning to build a home
description.author: Alica P
description.content:
A Sioux Falls couple was denied Tuesday a chance to build a rural home near Rowena.Angelo and Maria Pappas had requested rezoning of 47 acres they own north of Rowena, from agricultural to planned development district. The rezoning would have allowed them to build a home on the property, which otherwise does not have an eligibility for a residence under the county's rural density laws.
The couple had bought the property six years ago without realizing it did not have a residential eligibility, the couple's son, Chris Pappas, told commissioners Tuesday. The commission denied the rezoning request, although commissioner Carol Twedt commiserated with the couple."As much as I would like to see the Pappases live in that beautiful spot," she said, "it just doesn't work with our laws."Commissioner John Pekas said that once the planned Grand Falls Casino in nearby Larchwood, Iowa, is built, the county will see requests for both residential and commercial growth along the Highway 42 corridor. He said the county needs to review and update its comprehensive plan to assure orderly growth in the area.Commissioner Jeff Barth agreed. He said that while land in that area is zoned agricultural now, "it's not zoned museum."
Chris Pappas said his parents will continue to seek ways to build a house on their land. In the meantime, they will continue to rent it as cropland.Reach at 331-2376.

description.hltext_display: Obama to celebrate pre-Christmas wins
description.content:
President Barack Obama is poised to cheer a new START and end an era of military discrimination, in a sweet coda to a year marked by anemic economic growth and a Republican revival.
Obama will sign into law a repeal of a ban on gays serving openly in the military - a long-held liberal dream - while the Senate is expected to ratify a new START nuclear arms deal with Russia, a cornerstone of his foreign policy.
He will travel to the Interior Department in Washington early on Wednesday to sign the law overturning the "Don't Ask, Don't Tell" policy on gay soldiers, amid likely scenes of jubilation from rights activists.
Obama promised to overturn the ban as he vowed to deliver "Change You Can Believe In" during his 2008 campaign, and the new law passed by Congress over the weekend will repair tattered ties with liberal grass-roots activists.
The US Senate meanwhile is expected to reach the end of a tortuous slog and finally ratify the new Strategic Arms Reduction Treaty (START) with Russia, which Obama has billed as vital to his "reset" of ties with Moscow.
After a fierce Senate battle, 11 Republicans broke with party leaders eager to hand Obama a crushing defeat, rallying more than the two-thirds majority - 60 votes - needed to ratify the pact.
A final vote on the treaty is expected by Wednesday afternoon.
The pact restricts each nation to a maximum of 1550 deployed warheads, a cut of about 30 per cent from a limit set in 2002, and 800 launchers and bombers.
The accord would also grant access to US inspectors who have been unable to monitor Russia's arsenal since the treaty's predecessor lapsed in December 2009.
It will mark a personal milestone for Obama, who turned to arms control issues even before he entered the Senate in 2005, and made a call as president for the eventual elimination of all nuclear weapons from the planet.
The White House has also delivered broad hints that Obama will hold an end-of-year press conference to frame thepolitical mood and position himself for the new realities in a divided Washington next year.
He is expected to then leave to join his family for his annual Christmas vacation in his native Hawaii, either Wednesday or Thursday.
Both legislative wins emerged from a surprisingly productive "lame duck" session of Congress that helped reinvigorate Obama's political fortunes after a humiliating reverse for his Democrats in November's mid-term elections.
The late-year session also included a deal with Republicans to extend tax cuts passed under former president George W. Bush that infuriated liberals because they included a break for the wealthiest Americans.
But Obama, noting the bill included extra unemployment benefits and arguing it will boost the economy, says the legislation was the kind of painful bipartisan compromise needed to get the people's work done in Washington.
The much-needed victories will also mark the end of an era of sorts for Obama as the new Republican-led House of Representatives will block the kind of sweeping social and economic reform legislation that has characterised his presidency.
Instead, Obama will have to fight a fierce battle on the budget and protect his signature political victories, like the healthcare reform and regulatory reform bills passed earlier this year.
The focus will inexorably turn to the 2012 elections as Republicans seek to thwart his campaign for a second term while the president hopes for a political payoff from a revived economy and a fall in unemployment, currently at 9.8 per cent.
Obama's approval ratings have held remarkably steady this year - between 45 and 50 per cent in most polls - hardly terminal for a first-term president.
But without a substantial fall in unemployment, the president will be hard pressed to make the case to voters that he deserves another two years in the White House.
Obama's aides argue that the recent legislation could provide a template for future work across the aisle.
"I think there is a lesson of the importance that these issues have with not just those on Capitol Hill but with the American people," White House spokesman Robert Gibbs said.
But given the recent history of gridlock, anger and fierce partisanship on Capitol Hill, few observers expected a new era of compromise.

description.hltext_display: 李宁21日再跌5.26% 德银大削目标价40%
description.content:
www.eastmoney.com2010年12月21日 16:41东方财富网
手机免费访问 eastmoney.cn|字体：大中小|我有话说 查看评论(0)
李宁(02331-HK)继昨日股价下挫15.86%后，股价今早再度受压，全天下跌5.26%，报16.94港元，成交额4.70亿港元，最高报18.00港元，最低报16.60港元。而非凡国际(08032-HK)全日报0.300元，跌4.76%，成交额1.59亿港元。市值两日蒸发超过45亿港元。
李宁表示，2011财政年度第2季度李宁牌产品订货会结束，按照零售吊牌价计算的订单总值与去年同期相若，其中服装产品和鞋产品平均零售价格均上涨超过8%，但订货数量则分别下降超过7%和8%；计及集团就给予经销商批发折扣作出调整之影响，订单总值按照批发出货计算较去年同期下降约6%。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
德银发表研究报告，决定下调李宁的投资评级，由原来「持有」降至「沽售」，及下调目标价40%，由原来24.4元降至14.68元，此相当预测市盈率12倍作估值。
德银指，李宁近期被坏消息所包围，包括其2011年第2季订货会按年跌6%，当中华东地区表现疲弱，为市场带来意外消息，而管理层亦未能?清业务可时见底，该行关注其成本走势，及基本面的复苏，料市场将进一步下调其估值。
德银称，下调李宁於2011年至2012年每股盈利预测18%至21%，以各反映收入下降，及较高广告及推广费用;而该行料李宁於2010年至2012年每股盈利预测各为1.09、0.98及1.11元人民币。

description.hltext_display: 25 indicted in drug ring that stretched from Mexico to South Jersey
description.author: Darran Simon
description.content:
Twenty-five people were indicted Tuesday on charges stemming from their alleged roles in a crystal methamphetamine, marijuana, and weapons pipeline to several South Jersey counties, the Camden County Prosecutor's Office announced.
The pipeline ran from the Mexican state of Jalisco to the border town of McAllen, Texas, into Ohio and then to Camden and Atlantic Counties, the Prosecutor's Office said. The network shipped marijuana in packages through private couriers or the U.S. Postal Service to recipients in Camden, Voorhees, Lindenwold, Hammonton, Waterford, and Winslow, officials said.
The defendants are accused of bringing four to six pounds of crystal meth and more than 20 pounds of marijuana into New Jersey each week, the Prosecutor's Office said. Three men - Hector Martinez, 28, of Camden; Joaquin Rangel-Cardenas, 24, of Sicklerville; and Alex Gonzalez, 29 - were indicted as the leaders of the trafficking network, authorities said.
Rangel-Cardenas and another suspect, Luis Lopez, 24, of Pine Hill, also face weapons-sales charges.
The crystal meth was manufactured in Mexico, smuggled to Ohio, and driven by members of the network to distributors in Hammonton, authorities said.
Drugs were sold on streetcorners, in homes or in bars, or delivered directly to users, the Prosecutor's Office said.
Investigators spent almost two years tracking the organization after the Postal Service intercepted a 60-pound package of marijuana mailed from McAllen to Lindenwold in February 2008, the Prosecutor's Office said. Authorities dug deeper and discovered that the operation stretched beyond marijuana, officials said.
The Philadelphia-Camden High Intensity Drug Trafficking Area Task Force, made up of federal agencies, four New Jersey prosecutor's offices, and local police departments, conducted the investigation.
Contact staff writer Darran Simon at 856-779-3829 or dsimon@phillynews.com.

entity.property: Philadelphia-Camden High Intensity Drug Trafficking Area Task Force

description.hltext_display: Woori Fin aims to halve NPLs next yr - chairman
description.content:
SEOUL, Dec 22 - Woori Finance Holdings Co Ltd 053000.KS aims to cut its non-performing loans more than by half next year to clean up its assets and strengthen risk management, Chairman Lee Pal-seung said on Wednesday. "By implementing a large-scale cutback plan on the non-performing loans of each affiliate and improving the group's credit culture, we expect to lower the group's 2011 NPLs by more than half," Lee said at a company event for 2011 management strategy. Woori's master plan for next year comes after South Korea halted the country's biggest-ever financial sector privatisation of Woori, aiming to end its costly bailout of the financial sector in the wake of the 1997-98 Asian financial crisis. [ID:nTOE6BG02O] Woori's NPL ratio at the end of September rose to 3.7 percent from 1.7 percent a year earlier.
The government suspended a public auction of its $6 billion-plus stake in Woori, citing market uncertainties, as two strong candidates -- groups led by Woori employees and customers -- pulled out of bidding.
Financial Services Commission Chairman Chin Dong-soo, promised to quickly come up with an alternative. [ID:nTOE6BL03C]
Lee told reporters that the best, most practical model for privatising Woori was to divest the stake to multiple investors.
Woori had sought an alliance with financial investors as it wants to avoid being merged with another company. However, two Woori consortiums withdrew their bid citing the hefty premium demanded by the government, a senior Woori official said earlier.

description.hltext_display: В Україні - новий міністр охорони здоров’я
description.content:
Президент України Віктор ЯНУКОВИЧ призначив Іллю ЄМЦЯ міністром охорони здоров’я, звільнивши з цієї посади Зіновія МИТНИКА.
Тексти відповідних указів від 21 грудня оприлюднені на сайті глави держави.
До призначення міністром І.ЄМЕЦЬ працював директором Науково-практичного центру дитячої кардіології і кардіохірургії МОЗ України.
Як повідомляв УНІАН, З.МИТНИКА було призначено міністром охорони здоров’я постановою парламенту від 11 березня.

description.hltext_display: Энергетическая система Ставрополья решает масштабные задачи
description.content:
+1 фотоФото: Дмитрий СТЕПАНОВ
Работников и ветеранов энергетической отрасли Ставрополья с профессиональным праздником поздравил губернатор В. ГАЕВСКИЙ. Он отмечает, что сегодня наш регион сохраняет статус надежного энергетического донора Юга России, обновляются технологии и модернизируется техническое оснащение предприятий, реализуются масштабные планы по вводу генерирующих мощностей, начата серьезная работа по энергоэффективности экономики края в целом. «Вы несете свет и тепло в дома, обеспечиваете бесперебойную работу промышленности и социальной сферы – это очень ответственный, серьезный фронт работы. А добросовестное отношение к выбранному делу по праву заслуживает уважения», – говорится в поздравительном обращении главы края.
Крепкого здоровья, счастья, благополучия и дальнейших успехов в работе желает энергетикам от имени Думы Ставропольского края ее спикер В. КОВАЛЕНКО. Он, в частности, подчеркивает: «Перед энергетической системой края стоят масштабные задачи. Уверен, что высокий профессионализм и большой опыт позволят вам успешно претворить в жизнь все намеченные планы».

description.hltext_display: "Baku Steel Company" zavodundakı partlayışda bir nəfər xəsarət alıb
description.content:
Azərbaycan, Bakı, 22 dekabr /Trend, müxbir K.Zərbalıyeva/
Çərşənbə axşamı "Baku Steel Company" zavodunun oksigen sexində baş vermiş partlayış nəticəsində bir nəfər yaralanıb. Bu barədə Trend-ə Bakının Nərimanov rayon prokurorunun köməkçisi Vilayət Məmmədov məlumat verib.
Yaralanan 25 yaşlı Azər Rzayev xəstəxanaya yerləşdirilib.
Faktla bağlı təhqiqat aparılır.

description.hltext_display: 昔日民企股金牌得主 何以成今日烫手山芋？
description.content:
的股价反复偏软，昨日更重挫15.86%，单日市值缩水30亿元，除中国动向外，基本跑输同类体育用品股，今日李宁(02331-HK)收市报16.94港元，跌5.26%，成交额4.7亿元。
过去李宁的股价和经营业绩表现出色，堪称是中资民企股的金牌得主。自2004年上市以来，股价一直向好，曾创下32元的历史高位，比当时的招股价升了逾13倍；在经营业绩方面，过去6年每年保持双位数增长，即使经历金融海啸也不例外；然而，近半年来李宁股价开始逐渐偏软，昨日更遭基金等机构洗仓，令人怀疑李宁神话是否已经终结。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
表面上看，昨日李宁股价下跌与其2011年第2季订货会按年跌6%的消息有关，但其中也包含著其他种种质疑；今年李宁品牌重新定位，不但改变了过去品牌标识，也推出全新口号，不过随著品牌的重塑，李宁的业绩增长开始放缓，这令投资人质疑管理层是否出现问题。
值得一提的是，日前非凡中国(08032-HK)与李宁的股权交易被香港联交所裁定为反收购，消息进一步打击李宁股价走低，同时非凡中国股价也跌逾两成；此前李宁先生以换股方式，将自己手上持有李宁公司股份注入非凡中国，市场对李宁公司便开始抱怀疑态度；如今李宁明年的订货情况不堪理想，加上此次被裁定为「反收购」，使得李宁成为各大行争相打压和下调评级的股份。

description.hltext_display: Sancionar�n alza en precio de tortillas
description.content:
El Gobierno mexicano advirtió hoy que sancionará a los comercios que aumenten arbitrariamente el precio de la tortilla, el alimento básico de la dieta mexicana, después de que una asociación de productores amenazara con hacerlo.
El secretario de Economía de México, Bruno Ferrari, descalificó las palabras de un líder de productores de tortillas, quien amenazó el fin de semana con aumentar el precio de un kilo de tortilla de 0,65 a 0,96 centavos de dólar.
La mayor parte de los platillos mexicanos se elaboran con tortillas, y en el país se utilizan para acompañar casi cualquier tipo de comida.
Lorenzo Mejía Morales, presidente de la Unión Nacional de Industriales de Molinos y Tortillerías (Unimtac), indicó que "los costos de producción" han aumentado para las tortillerías, lo que las ha "orillado a tomar la determinación de incrementar el precio de la tortilla".
Mejía acusó al Gobierno de cuidar los intereses de supuestas empresas "especuladoras", como la mexicana Gruma, el mayor productor de harina de maíz del mundo, y la estadounidense Cargill.
"En mayo la tonelada de maíz a pie de molino se cotizaba en 253 dólares, hoy está en 297 dólares y, como van las cosas, tememos que alcance los 321 dólares en enero, mientras el Gobierno federal no se da por enterado y sigue 'apapachando' (consintiendo) a los especuladores", aseguró.
Ferrari dijo que Mejía "representa a una de muchas organizaciones" que reúnen a los fabricantes de ese producto en el país, y que sus amenazas no implican "que las tortillerías puedan hacer aumentos de precios de este tipo injustificadamente".
Según la Secretaría de Economía, el precio promedio de la tortilla en México está actualmente en 0,79 centavos de dólar, aunque el rango en el país varía de 0,5 centavos a 1,02 dólares.
Las sanciones para las tiendas que aumenten el precio indiscriminadamente pueden alcanzar hasta unos 160.510 dólares.
En los últimos dos años el incremento al precio de la tortilla, en promedio, se ha mantenido por debajo de la inflación.

description.hltext_display: Waterbury police lieutenant found dead in home
description.content:
Lt. Michael Silva, on left, was promoted to lieutenant in 2007. Silva, an 18-year veteran of the Waterbury Police Department, was found dead Monday in his Waterbury home. Police believe his death was caused by a medical condition. RA Archive
WATERBURY -- Police Lt. Michael Silva could waft fumes of super glue overtop spent bullet casings to reveal fingerprints hidden from the naked eye.
He knew where to find DNA on firearms left behind by suspects who thought they had covered their tracks by wiping their weapons down.
Silva could find the hidden clues left behind by men and women who tried to skirt the law, but now his wealth of knowledge is gone from the department.
Silva, who oversaw the department's crime laboratory, was found dead in his city home Monday afternoon. He turned 49 last week.
Full Access to articles on REP-AM.COM is available at no charge to Republican American 7 Day Subscribers. To activate your subscription or purchase an online subscription , login or Register now.
Username:
Password:
More Stories About: Waterbury, Lt. Michael Silva
" A TREMENDOUS LOSS TO THE CITY OF WATERBURY. THE EPITOME OF A POLICE OFFICER... EVERY YOUNG RECRUIT SHOULD SET HIS GOALS TO ACHIEVE THE RESPECT, KNOWLEDGE, AND LOVE OF HIS FELLOW OFFICERS AS LT. (MIKE) SILVA DIS... GOD SPEED BROTHER YOU SURELY WILL BE MISSED. "
Joe wrote on Dec 21, 2010 7:54 AM:
" A medical condition that contributed to his demise and he was still active on the force?? That seems quite odd. It's a tragic loss, as he lived 3 houses from me. Nice fellow. "
maf wrote on Dec 21, 2010 8:35 AM:
" RIP Mikey, you were one of a kind and will be missed. "
joanne wrote on Dec 21, 2010 9:16 AM:
" may others follow the path you led - you treated everyone with respect and dignity. You were a legend in your field..may you rest in peace...you will be missed. "
joanne wrote on Dec 21, 2010 9:17 AM:
" may others follow the path you led. You were a legend in your field. may you find eternal peace and rest. You will be sadly missed Mike... "
Ray Rivera wrote on Dec 21, 2010 10:34 AM:
" Waterbury has loss another one of their great publc servants so young. My deepest condolences to the family, friends and the Waterbury Police Department on their loss. Rest In Peace Friend.. "
richard Baptiste wrote on Dec 21, 2010 2:27 PM:
" Mike was a true friend we grew up together my heart goes out to Anna his mom and the family Mike will be dearly missed People are many friends are few and Mike was a true friend rest in peace Mike The cape Verdean people have lost one of their best "
Richard wrote on Dec 21, 2010 2:30 PM:
" Mike will be dearly misses we grew up together he was and always will be a true friend my heart goes out to his mom Anna and the rest of the family the Cape Verdean people and the city of Waterbury has lost one of their best Rest in peace Mike "
Bob Beal wrote on Dec 21, 2010 5:13 PM:
" Mike was previously on the Meriden Police Dept. He was a good man and he will be sorely missed by his brothers and sisters at Meriden P. D. also. "
Joyce wrote on Dec 21, 2010 5:19 PM:
" I worked with Mike when he was a police officer in Meriden. He was always a class act, and had a heart of gold. "Superstar 301", you'll be missed!! "
Tom Cirillo wrote on Dec 21, 2010 6:28 PM:
" A tremendous loss not only to Waterbury PD but to the Law Enforcement Community. Mike was a Great D.A.R.E. Officer when he was with Meriden P.D. Rest in Peace "Cool". "
Eliot MPD 050 wrote on Dec 21, 2010 7:03 PM:
" Mike and I worked together on MPD until he left to go to Waterbury PD. He was a great officer and friend. He will be greatly missed. RIP Mike "
Eliot MPD 050 wrote on Dec 21, 2010 7:11 PM:
" Mike and I worked together on the Meriden PD until he left to go to Waterbury PD. He was a great officer and friend. He will be greatly missed by all. RIP Mike "301" "
Costante2071 wrote on Dec 21, 2010 8:39 PM:
" Very saddened to hear of this news. I am a Sandusky police officer in Sandusky Ohio, who was born in Waterbury. Did not known the man but just want to send my condolences to the fallen brother in blue. Law is the safeguard of freedom "
someone wrote on Dec 21, 2010 10:01 PM:
" its always saddening to hear of someone dying so young. condolences to his family and friends. "
KG300 MPD wrote on Dec 21, 2010 10:03 PM:
" To my former academy classmate "301", rest in peace, you'll surely be missed. "
Jamison wrote on Dec 21, 2010 11:00 PM:
" I'm both shocked and saddened to read of Lt. Silva's death.
I worked as a Rep-Am photojournalist for more than 10 years and had many great conversations with Mike while we both did our jobs.
It didn't matter what time of day, what neighborhood or what reason he was there- working a horrific crime scene or an extra duty shift at a football game- he always had a kind word and an easy smile.
Waterbury was tremendously lucky to have had him serve and I to have known him.
RIP Lt. Silva.
Jamison C. Bazinet "

description.hltext_display: У Криму в пожежі загинули мати з сином
description.content:
У Криму при пожежі в одноповерховому будинку барачного типу загинуло двоє людей.
Як повідомила прес-служба кримського управління МНС, тіла 59-річної жінки і її 24-річного сина були виявлені в селі Тунельне Сакського району увечері 21 грудня.
Вогонь знищив крівлю будинку.
Попередня причина пожежі - необережне поводження з вогнем.
Збитки встановлюються.

description.hltext_display: A股震荡上扬收高 港股高开高走升354点
description.content:
美国股市周一收盘涨跌不一。投资者一方面为朝韩局势趋缓感到放松，但同时为欧洲银行业界评级遭到调降的消息感到担心。金融机构Stifel Nicolaus将美国运通的评级下调，美国运通股价跌逾3%。巴克莱上调亚马逊目标价，亚马逊升3%。道指收盘跌13.78点，至11478.13点，跌幅0.12%。那斯达克综合指数涨6.59点，至2007年12月31日以来最高收盘水平2649.56点，涨幅0.25%。标准普尔500指数涨3.17点，至2008年9月19日以来最高收盘水平1247.08点，涨幅0.25%。
外围主要股偏稳，港股今早高开72.38点，报22711.46；国企指数报12466.94，高开58.45点。因随着朝鲜半岛局势缓解，逢低吸纳者入市，同时A股大幅收高亦带来支持，港股开盘后没有回补缺口，反复向上，惟23000未企稳，收升354点或1.6%，报22993；国指扬198点或1.6%，收12607，惟大市成交仅599.5亿元。十二月恒指期货涨1.3%，至22,997点，大致与恒生指数的涨幅一致(恒生指数涨1.4%)。该合约较恒生指数盘中一直大幅高水，目前大约高水30-40点，表明恒生指数短期内看涨。成交量温和，为58,308张。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
成份股近全线上升 本港地产股跑赢大市
恒指成份股近全线上升，上涨达44家，持平1家。汇控[00005.HK]升1.1%重上80。上客放缓中移[00941.HK]仅靠稳收77.20港元，对手联通[00762.HK]持平于11.64港元，为唯一一只无上涨蓝筹。前期领涨股和记黄埔[00013.HK]升4.28%冠蓝筹，至80.40港元，港交所[00388.HK]升2.35%报178.80港元，均明显跑赢大市1.6%的升幅，它们的表现强于大盘有望提振市场人气，预示着恒指或进一步反弹。收租股九仓[00004.HK]及太古[00019.HK]升逾3%，各报56.30、124.50港元。中国神华[01088.HK]升3.69%报32.30港元，受到其获母公司注入人民币87亿元资产的消息推动，其它资源股亦有不错表现，得益于原油价格上涨。中海油[00883.HK]、中石油[00857.HK]各升1.85%、3.05%，分别报9.91、18.26港元。大市反弹，防御性的公用股受冷落，“两电一气”升幅在0.5%-0.9%不等，跑输大市。本港地产股反弹，地产分类指数扬1.8%，跑赢大市，新盘撞期的长实[00001.HK]、新地[00016.HK]各升2.02%、1.73%，分别报116.30、129.40港元。
中资银行股普遍上扬 巴克莱仍看好
中资银行股随大市反弹，9只中资银行股除重庆农村商业银行[03618.HK]跌0.39%外，其余全部上扬，升幅在0.2%-2.2%不等，升幅逾1.2%的有四家。巴克莱称，中国明年将进一步上调存款准备金率，预计最高升至25%。该行补充称，中国银监会对银行贷款/存款比的要求是75%，因此存款准备金率上限25%是合理的，否则中型合资银行将没有足够的存款支付贷款。目前大型银行的存款准备金率为18.5%，小型银行为16.5%。巴克莱认为，上调存款准备金率有助于提高银行的净息差；该行称，当央行收紧货币供应时，货币市场利率和债券收益率将会上升。巴克莱仍看好中资银行股；重申对中国银行[03988.HK]、建设银行[00939.HK]、工商银行[01398.HK]和交通银行[03328.HK]的增持评级。中行、建行、工行及交行各升1.48%、0.87%、1.05%、2.21%。
中资航空股随大市反弹 高盛下调中资航空公司2010-12年盈利预期
中资航空股随大市反弹，惟高盛下调中资航空股2010-12年盈利预期。高盛将中国国航[00753.HK]、东方航空[00670.HK]和南方航空[01055.HK]2010-12年每股盈利预期下调14%-30%，此前下调了中资航空公司2010年乘客流量增长预期，因第四季度经营环境可能比较疲软。高盛称，11月份的流量数据显示国内航线增长放慢，预计12月份将继续较上年同期放慢增长，因为从历史上看，12月份国内旅游通常放慢。尽管存在短期的不利因素，高盛重申对客流量长期的乐观看法；高盛预计2011-12年国内客流量将增长15%。高盛将中国国航H股目标价从9.80港元下调至8.40港元，将其A股目标价从人民币13.00元下调至11.50元，给予H股中性评级，A股卖出评级。高盛将南方航空H股目标价从3.90港元下调至3.10港元，将其A股目标价从人民币7.50元下调至6.00元，均给予卖出评级。高盛将东方航空H股目标价从7.00港元下调至5.10港元，将其A股目标价从人民币13.40元下调至10.20元；均给予买入评级。国航、东航及南航各升3.30%、3.08%、1.61%。
航运股普遍上涨 大行升评级中海集运涨半成
航运股普遍上涨，货柜、干散货航运公司多数跑赢大市。货柜航运股中，中海集运[02866.HK]升5.18%至3.25港元，高盛把中海集运的评级由中性调高至买进，维持目标价在3.90港元不变，因为该行认为2011年上半年现货运费率将回升，与同业相比中海集运的现货运输业务的比重相对较高，因此该公司已经做好充分准备将从运费率的上涨中受益。高盛认为，由于重新囤积库存的时间早于预期，因此这可能导致集装箱货运业务于2011年1月份反弹，进而推动集装箱货运业务的运费率回升，这将给市场调查带来惊喜。该行表示，从长期看随着中国与新兴市场之间的贸易更加频繁，中海集运也可能从中受益；东方海外[00316.HK]升2.06%至69.50港元。在干散货航运股中，中海发展[01138.HK]涨1.17%，至10.36港元；中国远洋[01919.HK]涨1.99%，至8.19港元，惟太平洋航运[02343.HK]跌2.36%至4.97港元，高盛将其评级下调至中性。
异动股
华脉无线通信[00499.HK]因所载先决条件未能确定何时达成，原本计划收购山西煤矿及洗煤矿协议已告终止，但相信对现有业务无重大影响。该股今早复牌最多泻42%，见2.86逾四个月新低，收报2.99，泻39.72%，成交急至270万股，为逾10个月来最多。

description.hltext_display: Twedt, Hajek honored for service to communities
description.author: Alica P
description.content:
Two Minnehaha County commissioners with long records of service in local government will cast their final votes next week.Carol Twedt and Anne Hajek, who both chose to retire instead of run for re-election to the county commission, were honored Tuesday at a reception.
Twedt has served on the commission for 20 years. Hajek was first elected to the commission eight years ago and before that she served from 1994 to 1998 as a Sioux Falls city councilor. She resigned from the council in 1998 to pursue an unsuccessful campaign for Sioux Falls mayor.Twedt's legacy is in human services, said Steve Munk, county extension educator."Her emphasis is with working with the population that sometimes gets ignored, the less privileged," he said. "She also has been very supportive of extension programs and especially the youth programs."Twedt was instrumental in the formation of a 14-county partnership that paid for the juvenile detention center's $2.5 million expansion in 1997.
She said the commission has had to pull together to get things done."There just isn't time for fussing or fighting or grandstanding," she said. "I love this form of government."Hajek said she has "thoroughly enjoyed" working with every county department and has helped hire a half-dozen department heads over the years.Hajek, a lawyer, helped update employee handbooks and has been invaluable in working with employee relations and benefits, said Ken McFarland, county administrator."She came with an expertise in labor law," he said, "and helped us get things current."
Dennis Olson, Brandon's assistant city administrator, has worked with both women over the years and said their longevity on the commission helped the county."They have a knowledge of what's happened in the past," he said. "It makes a difference. They understand why they (made certain policies) and why it was important to do it."Any time (long-term) people leave, it's a loss to the process," Olson addedMcFarland said: "Both of them will leave a lasting impact on county operations for years to come."Cindy Heiberger and Gerald Beninga were elected in November to fill the seats vacated by Twedt and Hajek. Heiberger and Beninga will take office in January.Reach reporter at 331-2376.

description.hltext_display: Які навушники найшкідливіші?
description.content:
Майте на увазі, що найбільш негативну дію на слух підлітка мають так звані «навушники-пігулки» (на жаль, саме вони більше зараз поширені). Чим менші навушники, тим ближче джерело звуку до барабанної перетинки, — тим більше навантаження на неї. Отже, ваш перший крок поговорити з дитиною і переконати замінити її «пігулки» на накладні навушники. Природно, користування такими навушниками зовсім не означає, що тепер можна буде вмикати гучність так, щоб музику, що ллється з навушників, чули сусіди. Не забувайте, що максимально комфортний рівень гучності — 80 дБ.
Для підлітків навушники — часто не тільки приємний звуковий фон, але ще і універсальні беруші — спосіб відгородитися від зовнішнього світу. Подумайте, що в цьому світі його так сильно не влаштовує, що він не хоче його чути? Часом одна задушевна бесіда з дитиною може подолати багаторічну звичку. Врешті-решт, зайвий привід поспілкуватися з рідним меломаном — того вартий.

description.hltext_display: الكويت تشهد ولادة اول فرقة اوركسترا سيمفونية
港股终见反弹 不妨适当建仓
description.content:
终见反弹，恒指早盘小幅高开后，跟随A股一路攀升，尤其是午后曾高见23025点，重回23000点关口，尾盘略有回落。恒指最终收报22993点，上涨354.78点或1.57%，大市总成交至599.54亿港元。
从盘面上的表现来看，汇控(00005.HK)带头上涨1.14%，重新站稳了80港元关口，而香港的地产蓝筹诸如长和系、新鸿基地产 (00016.HK)及新世界发展 (00017.HK)等也出现普涨的局面。中资概念股方面，除内银股全面反弹外，内房股也跟A股的地产股产生联动，均有不错表现。这可能与市场开始逐步消化国内紧缩性政策有关。此外，马鞍山钢铁(00323.HK)及鞍钢(000347.HK)等钢铁股的上涨幅度更达到4%，主要是市场预计钢铁价格将于明年1月份上调，而该板块超跌也引发部分资金逢低吸货。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
自国内实行上调准备金率等紧缩性政策，加上年底资金紧张，港股一直处于缩量盘整格局，而最近朝韩地区的紧张局势，更是令恒指曾一度跌破盘整区下限，低见22392点，形成头肩顶态势。不过，港股昨日的强劲反弹，应该对股市继续下行起到一定的抑制作用。这主要归功于几个方面，一是朝鲜半岛紧张局势得到一定的缓解，部分资金出现回补。二是中国发表有关对欧洲国家采取的应对危机措施表示支持的讲话，市场猜测中国可能会进一步加大购买欧元区债券的举动。三是在亚太股市普遍受压的同时，美股却一直跑赢其他股市，在经济有所回暖的背景下，投资者对本周将公布的一系列经济数据充满憧憬，这也间接支持港股市场人气。
但是，我们也不要太乐观，因为从成交量的表现来说，此次反弹并不充分，说明仍有不少投资者对后市持谨慎态度。因此，个人认为，尽管目前恒指重新回到之前盘整区域，但并不见得持续反弹即将来临，但可以看出一点，如果未来没有意外的利空因素，港股目前估值比较合理，即下跌空间已有限，在操作上可以适当建仓。
衍生工具交易方面，如果看多大盘的投资者可关注恒指认购证27301，反之，则可继续关注其认沽证27305.

description.hltext_display: 洗盘成功 短期港股将维持高位震荡
description.content:
个交易日的洗盘之后，港股周二终于走出明显反弹，一举收复之前三日的跌幅。恒指早盘便高开72点，随后反复向上，午后更一度冲破23000点大关，最高见到23025点，尾市不能维持在高位震荡，没有再回落，可见其走势相当强势。恒指最终收报22994点，大涨355点或1.57%。全日主板成交则继续萎缩至600亿港元，表明上升时抛盘并不太大，相信有更多投资者期盼港股于节后或再现一波主升浪。
从盘面上看，虽然消息不多，但个股普遍上扬，保险、石油与天然气、房地产板块引领行情，其板块升幅昨日均超过2%；零售板块则继续疲弱，再跌0.55%。保险股受到投资者追捧，中国财险(02328.HK)、中国平安(02318.HK)，与中国太平(00966.HK)昨日分别上涨4.57%，3.36%与2.7%。国际油价持续走好，而昨日又有传闻称发改委将上调油价，其中汽油每吨上调310元，柴油每吨上调300元。相关消息刺激石油板块走高，其中石油设备股中海油服(02883.HK)更是劲升5.33%，创下2008年中以来新高；中海油(00883.HK)，中石油(00857.HK)，与中石化 (00386.HK)也分别升3.05%，1.85%和1.55%。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
我们认为，在经历成功洗盘之后，年末余下的几个交易日，港股将上升并维持高位震荡态势。当然，投资者也需要持续关注欧洲债务危机的有关最新进展，如果没有特殊情况发生，港股接下来的震荡中轴很可能提高至23500点左右。
今天我们讲讲中国的保险行业。我们预计“十二五”期间保险行业增速会略降，但依然保持快速发展，寿险方面由于居民收入的增加，加上人口老龄化进程的加快，将为行业增长提供动力，预计“十二五”期间中国寿险保费将保持18%左右的复合增速；产险方面，由于中国汽车保有量增速将逐渐下降至15%左右，我们预计未来5年复合增速在15%-18%之间。
固定收益方面，短期来看中国处于加息周期的前端，固定类收益处在上行通道之中；中长期而言，劳动力成本上升，经济向消费转型将使CPI中枢提升，同时提升长期债券收益率中枢。总体而言，保险公司投资收益步入上行通道，保险公司利差将逐渐扩大，净资产、净利润也将迎来较高的增长期。
在研究了不同市场中保险股在利率周期中与大盘相对收益之后，我们发现在加息周期初期保险股表现是超越大盘的，因此我们认为目前是保险股配置的好时机。可留意包括中国平安等在内的保险股。 (交银国际 徐麟威)

description.hltext_display: Waterbury police deny 4 suspects were beaten
description.content:
WATERBURY — Police say that four suspects who claim they were beaten by police are vastly exaggerating the incident and that there is no evidence police acted inappropriately.
On Saturday, police allowed a reporter and photographer to view the vehicle, a 20-year-old Lexus, that a man and three teenagers claimed was vandalized during an arrest on Dec. 11. Police had denied a request to see the car on Thursday.
The four filed written complaints that police officers verbally and physically abused them, and that officers trashed the car. Waterbury Police Department is conducting an Internal Affairs Investigation, which so far as turned up nothing to substantiate those claims, said Capt. Chris Corbett, police spokesman.
"Although the investigation is not complete, all indications are that officers acted properly and followed protocol," Corbett said. Police say there is no damage to the vehicle and that all of the suspects declined medical treatment after the arrest.
More Stories About: Waterbury, Waterbury Police, Anthony Schovanec, Waterville Street

description.hltext_display: Feds: Medicare bilked for inhaler drugs in Fla.
description.author: KELLI KENNEDY
description.content:
MIAMI -- A scam tricked Medicare into paying for nearly 10 times more units of an inhaler drug than were available in South Florida, costing taxpayers millions, according to a federal investigation released Wednesday.
The scams over an 18-month period are the latest to be pulled off in Miami and its surrounding communities, which are the national epicenter for Medicare fraud.
According to investigators, Medicare paid for 7 million units of the drug arformoterol, even though the manufacturer and the three largest wholesalers sold only 750,000 units in the area in 2008 and the first half of 2009.
The drug is used to treat chronic bronchitis and emphysema and legitimate sales to patients should have cost about $3.7 million during that time period.
Instead, South Florida providers, mainly in Miami-Dade County, were paid $34 million, according to the report by the Department of Health and Human Services Office of Inspector General that was first obtained by The Associated Press. That's just more than half of the $62 million worth of the drug that was billed, though Medicare typically only pays for a portion of such drug costs.
Miami is responsible for roughly $3 billion of the estimated $60 billion to $90 billion a year in Medicare fraud committed nationally. The spike in arformoterol only came after authorities tried to crack down on another inhaler drug, and illustrates a constant problem plaguing investigators. As authorities have caught onto one scam, crooks have moved on to another, such as by shifting from durable medical equipment and HIV drug scams to physical therapy and home health care fraud.
The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services developed a system in 2008 that red-flagged claims showing whether another inhaler drug, budesonide, exceeded the maximum amount a doctor could prescribe. Sales dropped by nearly 50 percent over the next six months.
Fraudulent providers quickly realized they couldn't get as much money for that drug and began billing Medicare for arformoterol at rates exceeding the amount of drugs available.
For decades, Medicare has operated under a system that paid providers first and investigated later. That pay- and-chase method was a boon for scam artists, giving them 90 days lag time to bilk the system and flee.
In some cases, the government's attempts to mitigate fraud have actually tipped off crooks. The agency can mine data to alert possible fraud. In some cases, they send letters to providers letting them know they were overpaid, which experts say only tips off crooks that authorities are on to them. That allows the suspects to skip town with their ill-gotten gains or set up under a different name and scam.
"We are enhancing the tools and the technology we have to stay ahead of criminals and identify their patterns of behavior early, instead of waiting until a fraudulent payment is long out the door, then trying to chase it down and recover the funds," said Peter Budetti, a deputy administrator for CMS.
Under the Affordable Care Act, the agency will soon be able to view Medicare claims closer to real time and flag suspicious patterns. More stringent screening methods, including more comprehensive background checks, have also been put in place for approved Medicare providers. The agency gets roughly 18,000 applications daily to become a Medicare provider. Now the agency can put a moratorium on new applications in certain areas, such as physical therapy, if officials notice a spike in fraudulent activities.
Medicare - the federal health care insurance program for people 65 and older and for the disabled - helps pay for stays at hospitals and nursing homes as well as related health care services, such as therapy and prescriptions.
The Department of Justice has pursued offenders, setting up strike forces in Miami, Houston, Los Angeles and other hot spots netting more than 720 indictments. But officials have long said the only way to end the problem is to revamp Medicare's pay-and-chase system and stop crooks before they get into the system.
The inspector general's report recommends that Medicare officials strengthen their claim review process to focus more on prevention, including through visits to questionable providers.
Medicare officials agreed to review problematic providers and provided details about its planned actions.

event_or_fact.property: We are enhancing the tools and the technology we have to stay ahead of criminals and identify their patterns of behavior early, instead of waiting until a fraudulent payment is long out the door, then trying to chase it down and recover the funds

description.hltext_display: MEN'S BASKETBALL: Ball State cruises past Mount St. Joseph
description.author: Conor Hockett
description.content:
Cardinals roll to largest win of season
Updated: Wednesday, December 22, 2010 01:12
DN FILE PHOTO THOMAS YAU
Sophomore Jauwan Scaife works his way around two Indiana State defenders in November. Scaife had a team high 15 points in Ball State's 95-43 win over Mount St. Joseph's Tuesday.
It was clear Ball State had a physical advantage over Mount St. Joseph before the game even started.
Ten unanswered points into the game, the Cardinals left no doubt who was the better team. The early runs propelled them to a 95-43 win over Division III Mount St. Joseph
.
The Lions' 43 points is the lowest total surrendered by the Cardinals all season. Active hands on defense forced the Lions into mistakes, resulting in 16 turnovers.
"I thought our activity level was really good defensively," said coach Billy Taylor. "They took a lot of threes, and we did a good job contesting the 3-point line. I thought our activity with our hands really set the tone."
Taylor said his team took full advantage of its superior size and speed. Ball State tallied 18 fast break points.
Junior point guard Randy Davis said all the running would not be possible without the effort on defense that turned loose balls into points in transition.
"When we get stops, I can get us out in transition easier," Davis said. "When you got shooters out there like Jauwan [Scaife] and Jesse [Berry], it opens the lane a lot. It opens up the post scoring which helps everyone out and makes it easier."
All the paint touches made scoring the ball look easy for Ball State. The Cardinals shot 59.3 percent for the game on the way to a season-high in points.
Despite the scoring output, Ball State struggled to hold on to the ball, finishing with 15 turnovers. Taylor said that may have been the result of players being too unselfish.
"We kept it somewhat vanilla in terms of what we were doing offensively," Taylor said. "We just tried to focus on sharing the basketball. Sometimes we over shared where we ended up with some turnovers where we should have shot the ball. But the 20 assists on 32 field goals was good."
After an emotional high that came from the overtime win over DePaul, Taylor said he was pleased to see his team come out focused.
"The tone was set by the starting guys," Taylor said. "We had a good intensity and a good focus about us. We'd been practicing well and really competing and I wanted to see that carry over to the games. I thought we did that today."

description.hltext_display: 22/12/2010 07:12 : India tests two nuclear-capable missiles
description.content:
(AFP)
The Indian military successfully tested two short-range nuclear-capable missiles from a facility in the east of the country Wednesday, a defence research official told AFP.

2007年并非和黄股价的高峰期，2000年才是高峰期，10年过去，和黄股价离 2000年高峰期的 120元(经调整)还很远。2007年恒指创新高时，和黄股价也超越不过 100元大关，现在，希望iPhone能协助和黄股价再创历史新高。目前， iPhone、 iPad都是用手指直接在屏幕上接触操作，不需要分开的键盘，生产这类触屏相关产品的世达科技( 1282)，也因此成了近期少数股价能不跌破上市价的新股。世达科技大约在半年前曾经准备上市，但是最后因为整体气氛不佳而取消，现在卷土重来，很凑巧又一次遇上大市表现不佳，幸好，股价最终表现得还不错，能逆市而上。(曾渊沧作者为城市大学、MBA课程主任)

description.hltext_display: C-Water propõe purificação da água de superfícies
description.content:
Design, Água, Meio ambiente
Comentários (0)
Para deixar um comentário você precisa se identificar. Escolha um dos tipos de identificação abaixo:
Fazer login com Abril ID ou Fazer login
com Facebook
São Paulo – O designer chinês Chao Gao criou um pote plástico que “produz” água fresca. A idéia do designer é oferecer um objeto útil, prático e barato. A promessa é que o objeto evapore água salgada – e até água de esgoto – através do calor gerado pela luz solar.
O C-Water baseia-se na destilação: o objeto é colocado sobre qualquer superfície de água e, quando o líquido evapora, sobra apenas água limpa – que escorre para uma parte separada do objeto. É aplicável às zonas húmidas, praias, barcos, esgotos e outros lugares.
O objeto é portátil, o que o torna prático para viajantes. O C-Water foi um dos vencedores do Incheon International Design Awards.

description.hltext_display: Anti-smoking gets 'ugly'
description.author: Dalton Walker
description.content:
A handful of Sioux Falls elementary schools have already taken part - with more schools expected to later - in a new tobacco-free initiative being promoted by the South Dakota State Medical Association Alliance.The 12-minute animated film, "Smoking Makes Me Ugly," is designed to educate children about the harms of tobacco use before they begin to smoke, said Grace Wellman, co-president of the Alliance. It's targeted at fifth-grade students, she said.
"The project presents the hazards of smoking through an animated video that captures the attention of children while delivering the lesson content," Wellman said. The DVD only became available a few weeks ago. It costs $74.95. The Alliance has purchased 75 DVDs and placed them in schools throughout South Dakota, Wellman said. The Alliance is working with local law enforcement to help implement the video in school districts.The film contains interactive lessons. Worksheets, handouts and teacher guides can be printed from the files included on the DVD, Wellman said.Christine Bruzvoort, a Sioux Falls school resource officer, said she has been contacted by principals this school year on three different occasions about smoking at the elementary level.So far, she has shown the video to fifth-grade students at Lowell, Longfellow, Hayward, Hawthorne and Renberg elementary schools.
"It shows you what smoking does to you," Bruzvoort said. "All the kids already know that smoking gives you cancer and it's bad for you, but this actually gives you a visual picture of what this does to your actual body."Minnehaha County Sheriff's Deputy Josh Phillips works with the West Central School District. He will show students the DVD in early January. Other school districts such as Garretson, Dell Rapids and Tri-Valley will soon follow, he said."It's just not a video itself," Phillips said, "it's a Power-Point with interactions that I think will really keep the kids interested in the video and keep them talking about it."Reach Dalton Walker at 977-3925.

description.hltext_display: O&G loses courthouse bid (231)
description.content:
Torrington company not among 3 finalists
LITCHFIELD — First proposed some 60 years ago, the county's new $60 million courthouse got one step closer to bricks and mortar recently when the list of bidders was narrowed from 10 to three by the state's Department of Public Works.
The final cut eliminated Torrington's prestigious O&G Industries.
The names of the contractors weren't released by the state to keep the process from becoming political, Sen. Andrew W. Roraback said. The names were obtained by the Republican-American.
A list of ten, which included Torrington's O&G Industries Inc., now includes three qualified bidders: The Fusco Corp. of New Haven, KBE Building Corp, which has offices in Farmington, and the Texas-based Turner Const. Co.

份走势呈强，推动大市上升。在强力弹升之后，恒生指数几近全日最高位收市，升势未尽。终於恒生指数收市位是22993，上升354点。如果日内恒生指数成份股成交金额持续偏低，近期升势难以持久。
从技术分析10天移动平均线在23016，然而蓄势重返10天移动平均线水平，有迹象走势转强。RSI-14在46，这个技术指标将升穿中位线50水平，反映走势将转强。

而动量基金等动向方面，整体投资气氛好转，资金回流股市，动力增强，预测未来数个交易日，恒生指数波幅在 22800 至 23300 之间。综合分析，银行股表现势将主导大市走势方向的关键。
及至最后，国企指数收市位在12607，上升 198 点。至於过去的中长线走势波幅，以黄金分割线预测走势，上个低点(2010年9月8日)是11734，而最近顶位(2010年11月8日)则位於14219，由顶位回落计算，0.618 关键位则在12683，可望重返 0.618 关键位。预料短期之内，国企指数波幅处於 12500 至 12800 的机会大。

description.hltext_display: Megválasztották a felügyelőbizottságot
description.content:
A Közszolgálati Közalapítvány kuratóriuma keddi ülésén megválasztotta a négy közmédium közös felügyelőbizottságát - közölte Balogh László, a közalapítvány kuratóriumi elnöke.
A felügyelőbizottság a törvény szerint öt tagú. A most megválasztott elnök Szadai Károly, tagjai Nagy Lenke, Balaton Anita és Bíró Ildikó. Mint Balogh László elmondta, január 31-ig a négy közmédiumnál dolgozó munkavállalók is delegálnak egy tagot a testületbe.
Szadai Károly előzőleg a Magyar Rádió Közalapítványának elnöke volt, dolgozott annak felügyelőbizottságában is. Nagy Lenke a Duna TV-t, illetve a közrádiót felügyelő közalapítvány kuratóriumában dolgozott - egészítette ki Balogh László.
A tagokat három évre választották meg.
Silhavy Máté, a kuratórium Jobbik által delegált tagja az MTI-nek azt mondta: a kuratóriumi tagok csak az ülésen kapták meg a leendő felügyelőbizottsági tagok önéletrajzát; a testület jobbikos és LMP-s tagja a szavazáskor tartózkodott.
Kránitz László MSZP-s delegált az ülésen azt javasolta, hogy az MSZP-nek, mint a legnagyobb ellenzéki pártnak is kellene tagot küldenie a felügyelőbizottságba, de erre - elmondása szerint - nem volt lehetőség. A szocialista kurátor az MTI-nek azt mondta: nemmel szavazott a javasolt személyekre.
Balogh László úgy tájékoztatott: az ülésen elfogadták a megszűnő közalapítványok zárómérlegét, illetve Németh Vladimir LMP-s kurátor javaslatára átnézik a négy közmédium menedzsmentjét érintő kifizetéseket 2005-ig visszamenőleg.
Forrás: MTI

description.hltext_display: Fiberweb Launches New Website to Showcase Defencell Force Protection...
description.content:
Blast protection with minimal risk of secondary fragmentation.
Defencell Force Protection Systems are ideally suited for mission critical deliveries to every corner of the battlefield.
Old Hickory, TN (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
Fiberweb, Inc.’s new website, http://www.DefencellUSA.com, showcases Defencell Force Protection Systems, a lightweight ballistic and blast barrier solution that offers weight and space savings over existing protective barriers. Created exclusively for US military personnel, DefencellUSA.com provides performance data that highlights how the Defencell system can effectively reduce the number of containers necessary to transport and construct ballistics fortifications in both combat and training.
This lightweight, 100% fabric system features a self-stabilizing honeycomb design that eliminates the need for heavy metal wires or hard plastic that can take up space during delivery. The new website provides an interactive catalog and product comparisons that demonstrate how these weight savings can translate to safer delivery capabilities and reduced risk of secondary fragmentation.
“Unlike traditional wire gabion baskets, the Defencell Force Protection System is compact, lightweight and durable, providing a smaller logistical footprint,” said Kim Tully, Defencell Field Engineer. “The website provides comprehensive resources that clearly outline the delivery benefits of the Defencell system. Whether air-dropping, sling loading, driving over rough terrain or hand carrying, the system is ideally suited for mission critical deliveries to every corner of the battlefield.”
Site visitors can view detailed product information, videos, product applications, and technical specifications. The site also allows commanders and field engineers to download detailed CAD models and installation guides, view side-by-side barrier system comparisons and performance data, order product samples and schedule on-site product demonstrations.
Made in the USA and extensively field tested worldwide, the Defencell Force Protection System is available in four interlocking units that provide effective ballistic, blast, and crash protection. Defencell units meet the testing requirements set forth by the Army Research Laboratory (ARL) as determined by the Engineer Research and Development Center US Army Corps of Engineers (ERDC).
For more information on Defencell Force Protection Systems or to request detailed product test results, visit http://www.DefencellUSA.com.
About Fiberweb
Fiberweb, Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Fiberweb plc, is one of the world’s largest and leading suppliers of high performance, specialty nonwoven fabrics. With its vast experience in nonwoven geotextiles, Fiberweb has long been regarded as a technological innovator with a strong portfolio of intellectual property, a preferred partner for customers focused on high-quality and reliable supply, and a consistent investor in a global network of competitive manufacturing assets. With revenues approaching $1 billion and over 1,800 employees worldwide, the company has a strong global position with major operations in North America, Europe and Asia.
Defencell is a trademark of Terram Ltd. An affiliate of Fiberweb, Inc., and J&S Franklin Ltd.

description.hltext_display: UN Chief Warns Of Ivory Coast War
description.content:
The UN's secretary-general has warned there is a "real risk" of a return to civil war in Ivory Coast after the disputed presidential election.
Ban Ki-moon said the incumbent, Laurent Gbagbo, was illegally trying to expel the UN's peacekeeping force after it recognised Alassane Ouattara as victor.
Earlier, an ally of Mr Gbagbo warned the peacekeepers that they could be treated as rebels if they did not go. And in his first TV address since the poll Mr Gbagbo stressed his legitimacy.
He also offered to let a panel representing international powers examine the results of the election. Mr Gbagbo said Mr Ouattara could leave the Golf Hotel in Abidjan, where he has set up his headquarters, protected by the UN. The army meanwhile announced the lifting of a nightly curfew, so families could "enjoy the end of year holidays and the New Year".
'Mercenaries'
In a speech to the UN General Assembly on Tuesday, Mr Ban said he was worried about the 10,000-strong mission in Ivory Coast (Unoci). Forces loyal to Mr Gbagbo were obstructing Unoci operations, and had blockaded the 800 peacekeepers protecting Mr Ouattara, he warned.
"I am concerned that this disruption of life-support supplies for the mission and the Golf Hotel will put our peacekeepers in a critical situation in the coming days," he said. "I therefore strongly appeal to member states who are in a position to do so to prepare to support the mission.
"Facing this direct and unacceptable challenge to the legitimacy of the United Nations, the world community cannot stand by," he added. The BBC's John James in Abidjan says roads leading to the lagoon-side hotel have been blocked and no supplies have been received for days.
Mr Ban said that any attempt to "starve the United Nations mission into submission" would not be tolerated, and warned those who perpetrated such acts would be held accountable under international law.
He also revealed Unoci had confirmed "mercenaries, including freelance former combatants from Liberia, have been recruited to target certain groups in the population", and that an arms embargo was being broken.
The secretary-general added that he had sent a request from Mr Ouattara to the General Assembly's credentials committee to recognise his choice for permanent representative and rescind the credentials of Mr Gbagbo's envoy, Alcide Djedje, who he has appointed foreign minister.
'Evaluation committee'
Earlier, Mr Gbagbo appeared on state television for the first time since the election to restate his claim to be the country's legitimate leader.
"I won the election with 51.45% of vote," he said. "I am the president of the Republic of Ivory Coast. I thank Ivorians for renewing their trust in me."
He attributed responsibility for the recent unrest to his "adversary's refusal to submit to the law". Mr Ouattara and his supporters were nevertheless free to leave the Golf Hotel and "go where they like", he added.
Mr Gbagbo said he wanted the international community to set up an "evaluation committee", which would "have the mission to analyse the facts and the electoral process objectively in order to resolve the crisis peacefully".
He also paid tribute to the police officers killed in the unrest, who he said had died defending the constitution. But he insisted the way forward was through negotiation.
"I don't want any more blood spilled. I don't want any more war," he said. Mr Ouattara responded to the address by saying that they had had five years of meetings and that no-one was in any doubt who had really won. At least 50 people have been killed in violence linked to the dispute, the UN says.
Mr Gbagbo has said the election was rigged in rebel-held areas of the north and was declared the winner by the Constitutional Council.
But the UN mission in Ivory Coast, which was involved in organising the election, backed the electoral commission in saying Mr Ouattara had won. The election, delayed for five years, was supposed to reunify the world's largest cocoa producer, which has been divided since 2002.
Earlier, the US introduced sanctions on around 30 close associates of Mr Gbagbo, following the lead taken by the European Union on Monday. Story from peacefmonline.com News:

description.hltext_display: 司马敬：基金趁机捞货 和记黄埔弹力惊人
description.content:
演结束令朝韩局势纾缓的有利氛围下，昨日亚太区股市得力于美股保持稳好的走势而全线反弹，尤以印尼急升1.92%、内地升1.79%、香港升1.57%及日本升1.51%最为悦目，印度则升0.86%重越20,000关，韩股续升0.83%。港股高开72点而略为回顺之后，即在期指相关买盘推升下升越22,800/22,900阻力，下午内地股市升幅扩大，恒指借势冲上23,025高位，石油、内银、地产股及和黄(0013)成资金追捧对象，尾市收报22,993，全日升354点，惟成交额只有599亿元。大市已抛离100天线22,538逾400点，代表大市有见底反覆上试23,500之兆。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
资源地产股续受追捧
昨日升市的最大特色，是过去两周随大市急回的优质股强力反弹，特别受惠经济复苏的资源及资产股最为突出，周初推荐的三大石油股、内银、港地产股及和黄(0013)，在昨日升市中可谓一马当先，成为实力投资者加码捞底及基金建仓收集对象。
诚哥一对捎宝是昨日升市的主要焦点，和黄(0013)在尾市发力重返80元关，高收80.4元，大升3.3元或4.2%，成交达11.7亿元，盘路所见，各路基金大盘增持，场面墟?。和黄在周一跌至76.4元低位，图表上已有双底强力回升态势，并一举突破50天线水平。这一波升浪，首站看86元，再破将上冲百元关。至于长实(0001)，昨日劲弹2.3元或2%，收报116.3元，成交3.98亿元。
其他一线地产股如新地(0016)、信置(0083)均有实力资金追捧，信置升0.32元或2.1%，收报15.22元，不过成交只有1.17亿元；新地升2.2元或1.7%，收报129.4元，成交6.45亿元。近日楼市交投已转活，已锁定盈利高增长的长实、新地、信置续可看高一线。
至于酝酿注资的天津发展(0882)，昨日登上7元关，高见7.09元，收报7.02元，升0.2元或2.9%，成交3,660万元。津发在周一突破6.41元年高位后，再抽升上7元关，两日升11.8%，强势毕呈。津发将获天津市政府注入优质国有资产已高唱入云，投资者可续持货等揭盅可也。
东亚内地发人债意义大
本地银行股东亚(0023)跑赢同业，升0.8元或2.4%，收报32.95元，成交6,480万元。在银行百分百存保制年终届满之际，东亚转强，可说意义重大。利好的消息是东亚刚获准在内地发行50亿元人民币金融债券，人行也投东亚信心一票，是最佳的圣诞礼物。

description.hltext_display: Semjén: fontos a hitben való megerősítés
description.content:
Kiemelt jelentősége van annak, hogy Jézus szülővárosa Betlehem, és az ezeréves múltra visszatekintő érseki székhely Kalocsa, testvérvárosi szövetséget kötött, mert a hitben való megerősödés és a hagyományainkhoz való ragaszkodás kölcsönösen erősíthetik egymást - mondta Semjén Zsolt.
A miniszterelnök-helyettes szerint, a magyar nemzet és Betlehemben élők számára egyaránt fontos a testvérvárosi szerződés, mert "a keresztény palesztinok két malomkő között őrlődnek, évről évre fogy a számuk, egyre többen mennek el szülőföldjükről, ezért nekünk keresztény embereknek küldetésünk az, hogy Jézus szülőföldjén megmaradjon a kereszténység".
Török Ferenc, Kalocsa város polgármestere és Victor Hanna Jubrail Batarseh, Betlehem polgármestere december 15-én írta alá a két város közötti testvérvárosi szerződést Jézus szülővárosában.
Forrás: MTI

description.hltext_display: Man accused in Wolcott pipe beating released on bond (238)
description.content:
umel
WATERBURY -- A man who police say attacked a Wolcott zoning official with a pipe on Friday was released Monday on a $350,000 bond following his arraignment in Waterbury Superior Court.
Edward Humel's attorney says his client was drunk the night of the attack and made a "stupid" decision.
Joseph R. Membrino Jr., who was elected to the Wolcott Zoning Board of Appeals last year, was walking from his car to his home on Spindle Hill Road when Humel confronted him, according to police.
"Edward then grabbed me by the shirt, spun me around and struck me with a large metal pipe in the back of my head near my neck," Membrino told police, according to court documents. "I then grabbed the pipe with both of my hands and held onto it so he would not hit me again with it. I then began to worry that if I let go of the pipe Edward was going to kill me."
More Stories About: Waterbury, Wolcott, Waterbury Superior Court
village idiot wrote on Dec 21, 2010 11:28 AM:
" let me get this straight Minnella says is client was drunk while he assaulted a man with a metal pipe. does this make it alright, I don't think so! if he was drunk then he surely would have killed him if the victim didn't grab the pipe "
c-type wrote on Dec 21, 2010 5:41 PM:
" If Minnella is your atty., you are guilty! "
Holy Cow wrote on Dec 21, 2010 6:56 PM:
" If your best defense is "I was drunk", you are in deep doo doo. Seems to me attempted murder would not be out of the question. "

распечатать| поместить в блог Александр Красненков, ставший в понедельник главой РФБ, прокомментировал назначение Игоря Липского новым президентом санкт-петербургского «Спартака».
«Надеюсь, что новый президент «Спартака» сохранит преемственность. При мне «Спартак» если и не семимильными шагами шел вперед, то, по крайней мере, вперед мы двигались. Когда пришел в команду, там было семь или восемь человек игроков, ни тренера, ни базы, ни персонала обслуживающего, ни офиса, ни пресс-службы. Сейчас мы обросли мяском, у «Спартака» есть все атрибуты баскетбольного клуба.
Администрация остается в клубе прежней, лишь президент будет новым. Им станет Игорь Липский. Сам он не играл в баскетбол, но в последнее время следил за «Спартаком» и не равнодушен к питерским командам», – передает слова Красненкова РИА Новости.

description.hltext_display: Letter: Thanks to all who helped honor soldiers
description.content: On Dec. 5, "C" Co. 1-158th Infantry had its Family Readiness Group Christmas party at the Hotel St. Michael's Ballroom. There were 147 people, including soldiers and their families, gathered to celebrate Christmas and honor the men receiving their awards.

description.hltext_display: Inquiry in doubt after NSW parly prorogued
description.author: Adam Bennett
description.content:
Critics have vowed to push ahead with a parliamentary inquiry into NSW's $5.3 billion electricity sale despite government attempts to kill it off by shutting down parliament.
The future of the inquiry was thrown into doubt on Wednesday morning when Premier Kristina Keneally announced Governor Marie Bashir had prorogued parliament.
The shock move, which came two months earlier than expected, means the parliamentary session has now officially been brought to a close.
Opposition Leader Barry O'Farrell immediately accused the government of trying to derail the upper house inquiry ahead of the state election in March.
But Christian Democratic Party MP Fred Nile and the Greens later obtained advice from the clerk of the upper house that the inquiry could go ahead.
Mr Nile, the chair of the upper house committee that will investigate the controversial sell-off, announced hearings would begin the week of January 17.
He said the parliamentary committee would meet as planned at 2pm (AEDT) on Thursday, to set the terms of reference.
"I think it was a bit like a poker game, a bluff, they thought by doing that, everybody said 'that's it, no committee inquiry'," he said.
"But I've made inquiries and advice from the clerks. There is nothing to stop the committee meeting."
While Labor MPs Greg Donnelly, Luke Foley and Kayee Griffin will attend Thursday's meeting, the government pointed to Crown Solicitor's advice that committees can't sit once parliament has been prorogued.
A spokeswoman for Ms Keneally would not say if the government will challenge the legality of the inquiry, which could see the dispute dragged through the courts.
Mr Nile said Treasurer Eric Roozendaal, who is in the US on government business, had called him on Tuesday to express his concerns the inquiry might jeopardise the second tranche of the sale.
The so-called gentrader rights of Macquarie Generation and Delta's NSW central coast power stations will be completed early in the new year.
The first tranche of the sale was controversially announced by media release just before midnight on Tuesday last week.
The resignation of eight board members from Eraring Energy and Delta Electricity, in a last-minute protest over the deal, further soured the sale.
Under the power sell-off TRUenergy has paid $2.035 billion for retailer EnergyAustralia and the right to trade the output generated by Delta West.
Origin Energy paid $3.25 billion for smaller retailers Integral Energy and Country Energy, together with the trading rights for Eraring Energy.
The opposition, Greens and business lobby have criticised the partial privatisation, saying the government hasn't realised the full value of the assets, and that the sale would lead to less competition.
Both Ms Keneally and Mr Roozendaal have defended the sell-off, saying the assets sold for "well above" their retention value.
They have also dismissed opposition calls for a judicial inquiry into the sale, but said they would welcome the scrutiny of the state's auditor-general.

description.hltext_display: 12月22日香港财经媒体精彩内容摘要
description.content:
香港信报
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
香港通胀率进一步攀升，11月份升至2.9%，主要由私人房屋租金和食品价格拉动；展望明年，通胀加剧的风险有增无减。汇丰预测，明年的通胀将飙升至4.4%，也有经济师预警，美国首轮量化宽松货币政策(QE1)对本港经济的影响才逐步浮现，QE2对资产价格的影响又将降临。
黑石集团大中华区主席梁锦松表示，持续看好内地本土的消费行业，认为随着内地城市化及中产阶级的兴起，将促进当地消费，相信内地未来20年将维持快速增长。
早前以投标方式竞投的北京CBD核心区地块，其中一幅确定由中国中信集团以63亿元人民币投得，刷新该市土地总价新高。此外，恒大地产(03333.HK)昨天以逾14亿元人民币投得广州金沙洲一地块，由于溢价高达100%，将是首块须向国土部申报的土地。
钟表零售商冠亚商业(00104.HK)主席杨仁称，为配合未来发展，正计划明年5、6月在北京王府井附近，设立总楼面3万平方尺的店铺，希望成为全球最大的钟表零售店。旗下自营品牌“尊皇”也将加强生产，冀望进军全球市场。
香港经济日报
市场消息透露，长实(00001.HK)主席李嘉诚正筹备分拆旗下内地出租物业，以人民币计价的地产信托基金(REIT)方式上市，一旦进展顺利，可能成为首宗在香港上市的人民币IPO，初步计划集资高达逾百亿元人民币，料可望在明年上半年登场。
非凡中国(08032.HK)鲸吞李宁(02331.HK)股份一案，因涉及反收购被证监会叫停，令股价前天一度跌逾25%。公司行政总裁吴志文指若上诉不成功，公司会寻找其他方式收购李宁。
康师傅(00322.HK)高层表示，现时家乐福对包括非加价方便面在内的所有产品，均已不再下单。有分析员指出，因通过超市销售之方便面的销售占比不大，加上其领先的市占率，相信对盈利不会产生太大影响。
香港明报
中国中信集团以地价63亿元人民币，中标北京朝阳区商务中心区面积最大的一幅商厦地，楼面地价相当于每方尺约1672元人民币。中信拟建一幢楼高500米，全北京最高的摩天大厦。消息人士透露，新地(00016.HK)正与中信洽商共同发展该项目。
紫金矿业(02899.HK)公告指，会于本周五(24日)就9月21日由台风引起暴雨而发生的溃坝事件，约见政府调查小组。事件造成22人死亡，523户房屋倒闭。
香港星岛日报
根据香港联交所发出的上市公司主要股东权益披露，南丰大股东陈廷骅已透过旗下公司，动用36.94亿港元，认购近6.6亿股远洋地产(03377.HK)旧股，占配股总数近七成，陈廷骅也因此成为远洋地产第二大股东。

description.hltext_display: Átkeresztelik Ferihegyet?
description.content:
A kormány azt tervezi, hogy Liszt Ferenc repülőtérre nevezik át a Ferihegyi repülőteret - értesült az MTV Híradója.
A kedd esti Híradóban elhangzott, hogy információik szerint a kabinet már tárgyalt is a kérdésről, de mivel a magyar állam csak kisebbségi tulajdonosa a reptérnek, így a döntést a német tulajdonosnak is jóvá kell hagynia.
A csatorna úgy tudja: a cél az, hogy már jövőre megtörténjen a névváltás, amikor Liszt Ferenc születésének 200. évfordulóját ünnepli az ország.
