description.hltext_display: Pennsylvania and New Jersey will each lose a seat in Congress
description.author: Tom Infield and Cynthia Burton
description.content:
Pennsylvania and New Jersey each will lose a seat in Congress as a result of slow population growth over the last decade.
The losses, announced Tuesday by the U.S. Census Bureau, reflect the decades-long shift of political clout from the Northeast and Midwest to faster-growing areas of the West and South.
In other words, Florida's and Texas' gain are Pennsylvania's and New Jersey's loss.
With 435 seats in the House of Representatives to be apportioned on the basis of the 2010 census, Pennsylvania's share will drop from 19 seats to 18 and New Jersey's from 13 to 12.
Texas will gain the most seats, four. It will rank second only to California, which retains 53 seats.
The Lone Star State will have twice the House delegation it had in 1920. Pennsylvania, which has lost more seats than any other big state, will have half what it had 90 years ago. "Although it is disappointing, this result was expected," said State Senate Majority Leader Dominic Pileggi (R., Delaware). "It is one of the consequences of the fact that Pennsylvania's population growth has not kept pace with other states." Gov. Rendell, appearing Tuesday night on CNN, said Pennsylvania's plight could have been worse. He noted that the state had lost "multiple seats" in several previous censuses.
Still the sixth-largest of the 50 states, Pennsylvania had its population grow 3.4 percent from 2000 to 2010, compared with 9.7 percent for the nation as a whole. As of April, according to the census, it had 12,702,379 residents.
New Jersey's population grew at a slightly faster rate - 4.5 percent, to 8,791,894. It slid from ninth-largest to 11th.
The population changes tallied by the census every 10 years dictate a reallotment of congressional seats. They also set the stage for state legislative districts to be remapped to account for shifts within states. That makes the count critical to both major parties' interests in Harrisburg and Trenton.
More detailed community-by-community population data are to be released by the census starting in February. But party leaders are already thinking about which members of Congress may get squeezed out by the realignment.
If the past is any guide, the remapping is likely to be highly politicized. In Pennsylvania, Republicans will be in the driver's seat.
That is because the Nov. 2 election gave Republicans control of the governorship and state House; they already ruled in the Senate. This puts them in position to redraw districts to suit their own needs.
Courts have held that districts must have equal populations. But they can be gerrymandered to favor one party.
Pennsylvania political sources say GOP leaders are likely to push two Western Pennsylvania Democrats - incumbents Jason Altmire and Mark Critz - into the same House district. The pair would then have to fight it out in a 2012 Democratic primary.
Population estimates have shown growth in some areas of the state - the Poconos and parts of the South and Southeast - while other areas, especially in Western Pennsylvania, have declined.
There is talk that the GOP may also move to protect Bucks County's Republican congressman-elect, Mike Fitzpatrick, by rejiggering district lines. Some Philadelphia voters now within the borders of his Bucks-centered district may be moved to U.S. Rep. Allyson Schwartz's district.
Schwartz, a Democrat in a district that is mostly in Montgomery County, is already in a strong position politically, so the shift would not affect the power balance.
Like most states, Pennsylvania allows party chiefs to control the remapping triggered every 10 years by the census. "Our process is totally political," said former U.S. Rep. Joseph M. Hoeffel III, now a Montgomery County commissioner. "Other states have figured out ways to make it much less political. They have a commission. They have figured out a way to do it on a more bipartisan basis." Hoeffel knows how these things play out. A decade ago, he was in Congress when the census dictated that Pennsylvania would lose two seats.
Republicans, also in control of Harrisburg then, combined Hoeffel's district with that of U.S. Rep. Robert Borski, a Philadelphia Democrat. It looked as if Hoeffel and Borski were headed for a primary battle in 2002 till Borski decided to retire.
New Jersey, by contrast, has a bipartisan commission handle redistricting. Twelve members, evenly divided between the parties, select a 13th who becomes chairman - and possibly the tie-breaking vote in mapping disputes.
New Jersey GOP Chairman Jay Webber, a Morris County assemblyman, said: "Taking it out of the legislative process does make it as apolitical as you can make it - which isn't very mu

event_or_fact.property: Taking it out of the legislative process does make it as apolitical as you can make it - which isn't verymu
Although it is disappointing, this result was expected; It is one of the consequences of the fact that Pennsylvania's population growth has not kept pace with other states.
Pennsylvania's plight could have been worse
the state had lost "multiple seats" in several previous censuses.

description.hltext_display: Daugaard creates Cabinet-level post for tribal affairs
description.author: STEVE YOUNG
description.content:
Next Page 1 | 2 Previous Page Gov.-elect Dennis Daugaard is creating a cabinet-level Secretary of Tribal Affairs, a move that he hopes will lead to more opportunities for state and tribal cooperation.Though challenging economic times won't allow for the creation of a new department with programming, "I think it's important to indicate to the tribes that I recognize they're an important segment of our population," Daugaard said Tuesday.
"They should have a representative from the tribal nations within our borders who has direct access to the governor," he said. "It should be a person with the stature of a Cabinet-level secretary." The governor-elect said the interviewing process is wrapping up, and he could announce the appointment by Christmas. It will be a tribal person from South Dakota, he said.Initially, Daugaard wants that new secretary to travel with him and Lt. Gov. Matt Michels to each of the state's nine reservations to meet tribal leadership, to learn about each tribe's unique opportunities and challenges, "and to see what ways we can work together on common solutions," he said.Recognizing the divisions that have separated the tribes and state in the past - from water rights to jurisdictional questions to taxation issues - Daugaard said, "there will continue to be some things on which we can't agree."But I do think the first thing is to develop a relationship," he said. "I think if we treat each other with mutual respect, I'm sure there will be areas where we can find solutions."
Joe Kafka, spokesman for outgoing Gov. Mike Rounds, said his boss wouldn't offer an opinion on Daugaard's decision."Gov. (Bill) Janklow did not do that to Gov. Rounds, and (Rounds), in turn, will not be a Monday morning quarterback who comments on choices made by incoming-Gov. Daugaard," Kafka said in an e-mail.Michael Jandreau, chairman of the Lower Brule Sioux Tribe, called the existing Office of Tribal Government Relations within the governor's office "almost a window dressing," and welcomed Daugaard's news."Somehow, it's at least recognizing that we really have a right to exist, and that we should have a place at the governor's table," Jandreau said.(2 of 2)Rep. Kevin Killer, D-Pine Ridge, likewise called Daugaard's decision "a step in the right direction.
"It's an acknowledgement by the state that there needs to be some kind of good relationship," Killer said. "And I like that he's looking at a nation-to-nation relationship between the state of South Dakota and the nine different tribes." Daugaard stressed that it is his philosophy that each of the nine tribes should be recognized separately, and that he thinks it's inappropriate to consider them as one combined entity."Just as South Dakota does not like it when the federal government treats us the same as all states, I think it's inappropriate to treat all tribes the same," he said. "They are in fact different tribes with different histories, different opportunities and different challenges."If the governor-elect's decision to create a Cabinet-level position allows the state and tribes to find solutions in places other than courtrooms and lawyers' offices, Jandreau said he will be all for it."It could be a very good thing," he said. "It all depends on how effectively it's utilized in dealing with the tribes."
Reach reporter Steve Young

But I do think the first thing is to develop a relationship; I think if we treat each other with mutual respect, I'm sure there will be areas where we can find solutions.

description.hltext_display: Pflege: "Schmerz hält sich nicht an Apotheken-Öffnungszeiten"
description.content:
Medikamente für Palliativpatienten in der ambulanten Versorgung? Da kann es für Ärzte bei der Verordnung Probleme geben!
Beim Aufbau der ambulanten Palliativversorgung haben Ärzte offenbar häufig Schwierigkeiten, ihre Patienten angemessen mit Schmerzmitteln zu versorgen.
Eine von der Deutschen Gesellschaft zum Studium des Schmerzes in diesem Jahr initiierte Befragung mit mehr als 200 beteiligten Palliativmedizinern hat bemerkenswerte Ergebnisse gebracht. Nahezu alle Ärzte (99 Prozent) fanden es danach wichtig, dass ambulant tätige Palliativärzte jederzeit auf einen gewissen Pool an Betäubungsmitteln zurückgreifen können. 86,3 Prozent hielten die Versorgung allerdings für unzureichend. Teilweise wurde sogar über eklatante Missstände berichtet.
Klage über gravierende Missstände
Zwar hat der Bundestag jüngst eine Gesetzesänderung zum Betäubungsmittelrecht vorgelegt, doch noch gelten die alten Regeln. So dürfen Ärzte Betäubungsmittel zwar am Patienten anwenden, sie dürfen sie ihm jedoch nicht überlassen.
Der Fuldaer Palliativmediziner Thomas Sitte, Präsident der Deutschen Palliativstiftung, hat in einem offenen Brief an Bundeskanzlerin Angela Merkel auf gravierende Missstände aufmerksam gemacht, die Ärzten immer noch die Arbeit massiv erschweren.
Überlassen von Arzneien ist verboten
Häufig sei es etwa zu ungünstigen Tageszeiten oder bei schlechten Wetterbedingungen nötig, den sterbenskranken Patienten medizinisch zwingend erforderliche Medikamente zu überlassen. Ein Problem, das gerade bei Patienten im ländlichen Bereich relevant wird. "Schmerzen und andere Qualen halten sich nicht an Öffnungszeiten von Apotheken", kritisiert Sitte.
Palliativmediziner auf Hausbesuch dürfen aber zum Beispiel morphinähnliche Medikamente gegen schwerste Schmerzen oder Atemnot auch nicht in wenigen Einzeldosen zur Überbrückung dieser Zeit beim Patienten lassen. "Tun sie das", erläutert Sitte, "so ist dies eindeutig ein Straftatbestand."
Problematisch ist auch der rechtlich riskante, aber aus Sicht von Sitte oft nicht vermeidbare Off Label Use von Medikamenten.
Für Patienten mit Erstickungsnot gibt es in Deutschland keine zugelassene Therapie, aber im Bereich des Off Label Use nach Erfahrungen von Sitte und anderen Palliativärzten gute Behandlungsmöglichkeiten mit Opoiden. Hier mache sich der Arzt strafbar, wenn er Patienten mit Betäubungsmitteln gegen Erstickungsgefühle versorgt.
"Menschen, die medizinisch korrekt und gesellschaftlich erwünscht anderen in Not helfen, dürfen nicht von existenzvernichtenden Geldbußen und Haftstrafen bedroht sein", kritisiert Sitte. Er verstehe die Rechtsprechung nicht: "Grundlage unserer Rechtsordnung ist die im Grundgesetz geschützte Würde des Menschen:
Was hat es mit Würde zu tun, wenn Ärzte Erstickungsgefühle, Vernichtungsschmerzen oder schlimmstes Erbrechen bei Sterbenden nicht mehr lindern dürfen, weil sie damit gegen geltendes Recht verstoßen". Nicht nachvollziehbar sei, dass es diese restriktiven Regeln in anderen Ländern nicht gibt.

description.hltext_display: OVB: engedélyezték a szavazólapot
description.content:
Jóváhagyta az országos cigány kisebbségi választás szavazólapját keddi ülésén az Országos Választási Bizottság (OVB), miután a Legfelsőbb Bíróság - megerősítve az OVB korábbi döntését - úgy határozott, nem indulhatnak a választáson az MCF Magyarországi Cigányok Országos Fóruma azon jelöltjei, akik nem nyilatkoztak arról, hogy a területi vagy országos választókerületben elfogadják-e a jelölést, illetve van-e választójoguk.
Az országos kisebbségi választáson induló jelölőszervezeteknek december 14-éig kellett bejelenteniük listájukat az OVB-nél, a testület az MCF listáján szereplő 52 jelölt közül 28-at nem vett nyilvántartásba.
Ezek a jelöltek ugyanis az OVB szerint nem nyilatkoztak arról, hogy a jelölést mely választókerületben (területiben vagy országosban) fogadják el, többen pedig arról sem nyilatkoztak, hogy választójoggal rendelkeznek-e. Az MCF ezek után a Legfelsőbb Bíróságon megtámadta az OVB határozatát, az LB pedig szombaton döntött és megállapította: 27 jelölt esetében helyes döntést hozott az OVB, amikor nem vette azokat nyilvántartásba.
Az LB szerint az OVB kizárólag olyan jelöltek nyilvántartásba vételét utasította el, akik egyáltalán nem tettek nyilatkozatot a választójogukra illetve a jelölés elfogadására vonatkozóan. Egy jelöltet azonban tévesen nem vett nyilvántartásba az OVB, az ő nyilvántartásba vételéről is rendelkezett a bíróság.
Az LB döntése után tehát jogerőssé vált az MCF listája, így az OVB keddi ülésén jóváhagyhatta a cigány kisebbség szavazólapjának adattartamát.
A jogszabály szerint az országos kisebbségi önkormányzati választás szavazólapja a listák nevét az OVB által kisorsolt sorrendben tartalmazza, ezeket az OVB december 15-én sorsolta ki. Az OVB által jóváhagyott cigány kisebbségi szavazólapon az MCF a Magyarországi Cigányok Országos Fóruma és a "Lungo Drom" Országos Cigány Érdekvédelmi és Polgári Szövetség listája szerepel.
A területi kisebbségi választások szavazólapjait pedig a területileg illetékes választási bizottságok állapítják meg.
A megyei és fővárosi kisebbségi önkormányzatok tagjainak választását 2011. január 9-re tűzte ki az OVB, ugyanezen a napon tartják az országos kisebbségi önkormányzatok tagjainak választását is. A választáson az elektorok, azaz a települési kisebbségi önkormányzatok tagjai választanak és választhatók, csak az szavazhat és csak az lehet jelölt, aki a szavazás napján tagja a települési kisebbségi önkormányzatnak.
Az OVB keddi ülésén elfogadta a 2010. évi önkormányzati választás összesített adatairól szóló közleményét, erre korábban azért nem kerülhetett sor, mert nem tudott jogerőre emelkedni az önkormányzati választás eredménye Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén megyei Keresztétén.
A településen azért kellett az október 3-ai választás után még háromszor megismételni a voksolást, mert a településre a szavazás előtt nagy számban jelentkeztek be olyan választópolgárok, akik korábban nem éltek ott. A megyei bíróság azonban vasárnap megállapította a legutolsó voksolás eredményét, így jogerős eredménye van a keresztétei helyhatósági választásnak.
Forrás: MTI

description.hltext_display: 苏皇：港股昨日现技术反弹 一度上破23000点
description.content: 发布研究报告称，港股过去两天测试100天线22500点支持，周二现较强的技术反弹，在内地股市午后升幅扩大下，恒指一度升破10天线的23000点整数关口，升势并能保持，收市报22993点，升354点，成交金额599.5亿元。走势上，短线市场于假期前未有重大经济数据发表，恒指技术反弹留意10天线水平约于23016点，破位留意20及50天线分别于23100点及23525点水平。若地缘政治及欧债危机问题升温，令市场情绪进一步转坏，则留意自5月底19000点开展之升浪的调整50%支持约于22000点。投资者现水平可采取短线的波幅策略。

description.hltext_display: Εορταστικές συναυλίες της Φιλαρμονικής
Japan forecasts GDP growth to slow in 2011
description.author: blade
description.content:
AFP - The pace of Japan's economic growth will halve in fiscal 2011 from this year as a stimulus-driven shopping rush eases and exports fall on a strong yen and softer demand, the government said Wednesday.
In its outlook report, the Cabinet Office also said consumer prices will stop falling but will not rise, dealing a blow to Prime Minister Naoto Kan's stated goal of ending deflation in the year.
Recent year-on-year falls in the consumer price index will halt in the middle of next year, the Cabinet Office said, but suggested this would not represent the defeat of chronic deflation in the economy.
Growth is forecast to slow to a real 1.5 percent from 3.1 percent in this year, the government said in its outlook report.
Government stimulus measures helped boost domestic production and consumption in the current year, including subsidy programmes for purchases of environmentally friendly vehicles and appliances.
Japan's economy grew 4.5 percent in the July-September quarter, amplified by a rush by car buyers to use expiring subsidies and smokers who stocked up on cigarettes ahead of a tax hike during the period.
The hottest summer on record also drove sales of items such as air conditioners, helping spur growth in the quarter. Private consumption accounts for around 60 percent of gross domestic product.
However, analysts warn of a contraction in the fourth calendar quarter as the removal of such one-off factors highlights Japan's exposure to a weakening export picture and slow domestic demand.
Recent data has shown a slump in industrial output, especially among carmakers, as well as weakening consumer confidence as such incentive programmes come to an end.
The economy remains mired in crippling deflation, as falling prices prompt consumers to hold off on purchase decisions in the expectation of further price drops, clouding future corporate investment.
Japan's export growth accelerated for the first time in nine months in November, data showed Wednesday, but the reading of a 9.1 percent increase fell short of expectations amid fears of a looming economic slowdown.
"The pick-up in the year-on-year growth rate of exports in November may look encouraging but exports are heading for a big quarterly fall," noted research consultancy Capital Economics.
Analysts said the Japanese economy remains locked in a trend of shrinking exports due to a stronger yen, which makes Japanese products more expensive in overseas markets, and expectations that overseas demand will weaken.
On Tuesday the Bank of Japan held its key rate at between zero and 0.1 percent after a two-day meeting, warning that a fragile recovery from deep recession was "pausing".
The central bank in October forecast that the country's economy would expand 2.1 percent in the fiscal year ending in April, and 1.8 percent in 2011.
Japan last month passed an extra budget worth 58 billion dollars to cover a new stimulus package aimed at averting the threat of a "double-dip" recession.
Kan's second stimulus package since he came to power is designed to ease concerns over deflation and a strong yen, and includes job programmes, welfare spending and assistance for small businesses.
Kan took office in June promising to slash spending and work towards cutting the country's massive public debt, at nearly 200 percent of gross domestic product.
But the state of Japan's economy has complicated his ambitions.
Consumer spending growth is expected to slow next year to 0.6 percent from 1.5 percent this year.
However, the government forecast unemployment to continue to slowly improve, with the jobless rate expected to fall in the fiscal year starting April to 4.7 percent from 5.0 percent currently.

description.hltext_display: Two people killed in one-car accident in Torrington (259)
description.content:
UPDATED: Goshen Road reopened
TORRINGTON -- The 2010 Hyundai Sonata in which two people were killed Tuesday sits heavily damaged on Goshen Road.
TORRINGTON - Two people were killed today when their car rolled over on Goshen Road, went over a stream and hit a guardrail.
The one-car accident occurred just before 1:30 p.m. near Ace Outboard Service at 182 Goshen Road. Police closed Goshen Road, also known as Route 4, from Riverside Avenue to Lovers Lane. The Department of Transportation reported that the road was reopened by 6 p.m.
The driver, identified as a female, was ejected from the vehicle and was apparently not wearing a seatbelt, according to police Lt. Michael Emanuel.
There was a male passenger who was wearing a seatbelt, Emanuel said. Firefighters had to cut through the belt and use the Jaws of Life device to extricate him from the vehicle.
Full Access to articles on REP-AM.COM is available at no charge to Republican American 7 Day Subscribers. To activate your subscription or purchase an online subscription , login or Register now.
Username:
Password:
" How is it that the woman was ejected, but had to be extricated. Does no one proof read? "
John Doe wrote on Dec 21, 2010 6:48 PM:
" I may be reading this wrong but... "Firefighters had to extricate the woman with the jaws of life device. She was the driver and apparently was not wearing a seatbelt. She was ejected from the vehicle? If she was ejected why did they use the jaws of life to get her out of the vehicle? Again, I may be reading this wrong, but I'm really confused. "
simpleton wrote on Dec 21, 2010 7:00 PM:
" The driver was a male who had to be extracted with jaws, the woman was ejected from the vehicle. Goshen Road is in Goshen. "
Howard Fielding rep-am.com wrote on Dec 21, 2010 7:26 PM:
" Thanks for calling the inconsistencies about the victims to our attention; they have been corrected.
Our reporter says that the accident occurred on Goshen Road, also known as Route 4, in Torrington. "
Kevin wrote on Dec 21, 2010 7:45 PM:
" The female was ejected from the vehicle. The MALE passenger wearing the seat belt had to be extricated from the car. A co worker witnessed the accident and that is what happened. People need to learn how to read. "
unbelievable wrote on Dec 21, 2010 9:49 PM:
" today two people died in a tragic car accident. I can't believe that all people care about is a typo in the posted article!
so congradulations to all you genious's out there that can pick apart a article I'm sure your attention to detail has brought comfort to the victims families! so keep up the good work or maybe time to get a life! "

description.hltext_display: Jövőre építik az M44-es gyorsforgalmi utat
description.content:
Jövőre megkezdődik az M44-es gyorsforgalmi út építése Kondoros és Tiszakürt között - közölte Kondoros polgármestere, a térség fideszes országgyűlési képviselője.
2010. december 21. kedd 21:47 - HírExtra
Dankó Béla elmondta: a Fidesz Békés megyei képviselőcsoportja kedd este tanácskozott Orbán Viktor miniszterelnökkel, s ott hangzott el a kormányfő részéről, hogy a 2011-es esztendőben, uniós források bevonásával megkezdődhet a térség lakói által régen várt útszakasz megépítése.
A politikus emlékeztetett arra, hogy a gyorsforgalmi út építését még 2002-ben ígérte meg Medgyessy Péter, ám azóta egy méter sem készült el az útból.

description.hltext_display: Defence inquiry finds export breach
description.author: Max Blenkin, AAP Defence Correspondent
description.content:
A sample of Australian Defence Force camouflage fabric was shipped to China without proper approval.
A defence investigation has found approval for export of the fabric sample would have been granted had it been sought.
However, the case has now been referred to the Australian Customs and Border Protection Service for possible further action under Australian export laws.
The defence investigation report was released on Wednesday with key details deleted, including the name of the company responsible.
At issue was whether Australian-developed camouflage fabric specially treated to minimise visibility to night-vision equipment was controlled under Australian defence export regulations.
The inquiry conducted by Colonel Terry McCullagh concluded it was and that a two-metre sample of this fabric had been exported to China without permission in 2008.
But he concluded this was no major breach of security.
That's because this technology is widely available. China produces its own comparable fabric for military uniforms and even manufactures combat uniforms for the British army.
In the case of the Australian disruptive pattern camouflage uniform (DPCU) fabric, the key technical details were first published in 1995 with further details released in 2004.
"There is negligible risk that any export of NIR (near infra-red) treated fabric from Australia would contribute to proliferation of military technology," Colonel McCullagh said in the report.
This problem came about as defence moved to tender for supply of combat uniforms over five years in a deal worth some $128 million.
Because of size and complexity and the risk of delay, the Defence Materiel Organisation (DMO) released an interim request for tender for supply of 120,000 combat uniforms over two years at a cost of $13.6 million.
That went to the two last used suppliers of combat uniforms. In December 2009, DMO entered a contract with one firm which included an option for supply of fabric from China in the second year.
It was subsequently alleged the winning company had contravened defence export controls by exporting samples of fabric and the specifications to a Chinese textiles company.
The Australian company subsequently admitted sending the Chinese firm fabric specifications plus a two-metre fabric sample.
It said it did that without knowledge that export controls might be contravened.

event_or_fact.property: There is negligible risk that any export of NIR (near infra-red) treated fabric from Australia would contribute to proliferation of military technology

entity.property: Australian Customs and Border Protection Service

description.hltext_display: Palliativversorgung - die Zuversicht wächst
description.content:
In Würde zu Hause sterben dürfen - ein Rechtsanspruch, der in Deutschland bislang extrem schlecht umgesetzt worden ist. Jetzt scheint es trotz vieler Probleme und Widersprüche endlich Bewegung zu geben.
Sie ziehen gemeinsam an einem Strang, um die palliativmedizinische Versorgung in Deutschland zu verbessern: Vertreter von etwa 50 gesellschaftlich und gesundheitspolitisch relevanten Institutionen haben im Spätsommer an einem Runden Tisch die "Charta zur Betreuung schwerstkranker und sterbender Menschen" verabschiedet.
Das Projekt war vor zwei Jahren von der Deutschen Gesellschaft für Palliativmedizin (DGP), dem Deutschen Hospiz- und PalliativVerband (DHPV) und der Bundesärztekammer (BÄK) initiiert worden.
Ziel der Charta ist es, die gesellschaftliche Auseinandersetzung mit den Themen Sterben und Sterbebegleitung zu fördern. Sie soll eine grundlegende Orientierung bieten und ein wichtiger Impuls für die Weiterentwicklung der Palliativmedizin sein", erläuterte Professor Jörg-Dietrich Hoppe, Präsident der Bundesärztekammer. Es gehe darum zu zeigen, wie eine Palliativversorgung aussehen muss, die sich nach den tatsächlichen Bedürfnissen unheilbar kranker und sterbender Menschen richtet.
KBV positioniert sich mit einem Vertragskonzept
Bei der Umsetzung der Spezialisierten Ambulanten Palliativversorgung (SAPV) hat es in diesem Jahr weitere Fortschritte gegeben. Stärker als bisher hat sich dabei die Kassenärztliche Bundesvereinigung (KBV) positioniert.
Sie will die Arbeit von Hausärzten als Koordinatoren aufwerten und legte dazu einen Vertragsentwurf "zur qualifizierten allgemeinen ambulanten Palliativversorgung von schwerstkranken und sterbenden Menschen" (AAPV) auf der Grundlage von Paragraf 73c SGB V vor.
Das in der Vertragswerkstatt der KBV erarbeitete Konzept basiert auf einem Konsens von Experten, nach dem 90 Prozent der Sterbenden ambulant durch ihren vertrauten Hausarzt in Kooperation mit anderen Vertragsärzten, Pflegern und weiteren nichtärztlichen Berufen versorgt werden können.
Nur jeder zehnte Patient ist danach auf (SAPV) angewiesen. Eine intensive Betreuung durch den Hausarzt ist in den derzeitigen Strukturen zwischen der kurativen vertragsärztlichen Versorgung und der SAPV allerdings nicht definiert. Das KBV-Versorgungskonzept soll neue Standards setzen, erläuterte KBV-Vorstand Dr. Carl-Heinz Müller.
Einzelverträge - ein schlechtes Konzept?
Die Umsetzung der SAPV auf der Basis freiwilliger Verträge, die Krankenkassen mit den Palliativcare-Teams schließen, ist aus Sicht Müllers gescheitert. Der Rahmen der Versorgung und Vergütung muss in einem Kollektivvertrag gesichert werden, fordert die KBV.
Der Vertrag müsse schiedsamtsfähig sein. Darüber hinaus müsse palliativmedizinische Versorgung im morbiditätsorientierten Risikostrukturausgleich berücksichtigt werden.
Die KBV stößt mit diesem Forderungskatalog in der politischen Debatte durchaus auf wohlwollendes Interesse. Der Patientenbeauftragte der Bundesregierung Wolfgang Zöller (CSU) etwa hat die derzeit geltende gesetzliche Regelung für die SAPV inzwischen in Frage gestellt. "Wenn Einzelverträge der Grund sind, dass die SAPV-Ziele bisher nicht erreicht worden sind, dann muss das geändert werden", sagte Zöller bei einer Tagung der KBV im Herbst.
Es gibt derzeit etwa 170 verschiedene SAPV-Verträge - mit steigender Tendenz. Die aktuelle Versorgungslage ist allerdings von Intransparenz, Heterogenität und Unsicherheit geprägt. "Wir brauchen dringend Transparenz, insbesondere mit Blick auf eine Vergleichbarkeit von Verträgen", so die Forderung von SAPV-Vertragsexperten in Berlin. Vielen Kassen sei Transparenz aber ein Dorn im Auge.
Welche Zukunftsperspektiven hat die ambulante Palliativersorgung? Trotz vieler Probleme und Widersprüche ist Bewegung zu erkennen -vor allem auf lokaler Ebene hat es offenbar in einigen Bundesländern erhebliche Fortschritte gegeben: Jeder Mensch soll das Recht haben, in Würde zu Hause sterben zu dürfen.

description.hltext_display: 时富金融：外围造好 今天港股有支持
description.content:
市场回顾
周二，恒指收报22993.86点，上涨354.78点，涨幅1.57%；国企指数收报12607.43点，上涨198.84 点，涨幅1.60%，大市成交599.54亿港元。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
韩朝局势趋缓，却逢欧银行业界评级下调，隔夜美股再现涨跌不一。恒指周二小幅高开后，短暂回探，之后一路震荡走高，加之内地股市大幅反弹带动，恒指一举突破5 日均线，重新回到23000 点一线。内银股全线上涨。交通银行(03328.HK)上涨2.21%；招商银行(03968.HK)、中信银行(00998.HK)、中国银行(03988.HK)、工商银行(01398.HK)上涨幅度均超过1%。保险板块普涨。中国财险(02328.HK)、中国平安(02318.HK)涨幅均超过3%。中国太平(00966.HK)上涨2.70%，中国人寿(02628.HK)、中国太保(02601.HK)涨幅均超过1%。内房股强势上扬。雅居乐地产(03383.HK)涨幅达5.60%，富力地产(02777.HK)、龙湖地产(00960.HK)涨幅均在4%附近。仅上海证大(00755.HK)下跌1.89%。中国神华(01088.HK)公布，出资87.02 亿元人民币收购母公司集团及附属的多项煤炭、电力等资产，从而扩大了煤炭储量并提升主业规模，减少集团内部竞争。刺激该股高开高走，放量上涨3.69%.
今日港股市场展望
外围造好， 港股有支持。昨天内地A股大升， 一举收复2900点， 受其影响，港股大幅反弹， 以接近全日最高位的22993.86点收市。但港股成交量持续淡静，因此很难断言港股是否已经结束下调而步入升轨。昨夜外围市场普遍向好， 尽管多个欧盟国家遭到评级机构的‘狙击’，面临被降级危险，但欧洲各国的股市并未受到影响，普遍录得超过 1% 的升幅。 至于美股，受到多个并购消息和其它利好的带动，道指升55.03点， 标普更是创下金融危机以来的高位。加上除汇控之外的港股预托证券普遍上升， 估计会对今天恒指的表现产生强烈的支持，并有望巩固昨天的升势。
内地成品油加价，短线利好股市。国家发展改革委发出通知，决定自12月22 日零时起将汽、柴油价格每吨分别提高310元和300元. 但发改委同时强调，为控制调价连锁反应，这次成品油调价后，城市公交、农村道路客运、铁路客货运价格、民航燃油附加标准均不提高。燃油加价短期内利好股市，油股，资源股等会受到支持，但长远来看， 调价的连锁反应不可避免，并有可能进一步推高CPI，内地加息的压力变大。
油股有支持。可能是内地成品油加价消息提前流入市场， 昨天油股表现强劲， 中海油(00883 HK)升3%，收于18.26元，而中石油(00857 HK)和中石化(00386 HK)也都录得超过 1.5%的升幅。 三桶油同时发力，总计为恒指贡献59点的升幅。 估计今天油股会持续走强，建议投资者关注。

description.hltext_display: Banking, other deals drive stock indexes higher
description.author: CHIP CUTTER and MATTHEW CRAFT
description.content:
NEW YORK -- Financial companies led stock indexes to new two-year highs Tuesday after another big banking deal raised hopes that more acquisitions could be on the way.
Toronto-Dominion Bank said it is buying Chrysler Financial, the automaker's old lending arm, from Cerberus Capital Management LP for $6.3 billion. It was the latest example of a relatively healthy Canadian bank buying a U.S. lender battered by the financial crisis. Toronto-Dominion bought Commerce Bancorp Inc. in 2008, and just four days ago Bank of Montreal said it would buy Milwaukee-based bank Marshall & Ilsley Corp. for $4.1 billion.
The S&P 500 closed above the level it reached on Sept. 12, 2008, the last trading day before the collapse of Lehman Brothers at the height of the financial crisis. The Dow Jones industrial average is at its highest since Aug. 29, 2008.
FILE - In this Dec. 14, 2010 file photo, trader Richard Newman works on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange.
- BYLINE WITHHELD
Corporate mergers have picked up strongly this year. That, along with signs of an improving economy and a tax cut package passed last week, have helped drive stocks up. The S&P 500 has jumped 6.3 percent this month and 12.5 percent this year.
Investors like to see an increase in deals because it shows that companies are becoming more confident in the economy. It also leads investors to hunt for companies that might become targets for buyers.
Research firm Dealogic reported Tuesday that the total dollar amount of corporate deals has jumped 18 percent to $2.7 trillion so far this year compared with all of 2009. Caterpillar Inc., Chevron Corp. and Google Inc. have also made significant deals in 2010.
"There is growing optimism about the economy, or at least the U.S. economy, in 2011," said Alan Gayle, senior investment strategist for RidgeWorth Investments. "We're 18 months into this recovery, and good things are gradually happening."
The Dow rose 55.03, or 0.5 percent, to close at 11,533.16. The Dow is up 4.8 percent so far this month.
The S&P 500 index rose 7.52, or 0.6 percent, to close at 1,254.60. The Nasdaq composite rose 18.05, or 0.7 percent, to 2,667.61.
Financial companies were the best performers. JPMorgan Chase & Co. rose the most among the 30 companies that make up the Dow. The stock rose 2.6 percent to $41. Bank of America Corp., Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Wells Fargo Corp. all rose by more than 1 percent.
"There's a perception that some of the ... bigger banks will start an acquisition program of their own in addition to what we're seeing with some of the Canadian banks," said Randy Bateman, chief investment officer for Huntington Asset Advisors.
Adobe Systems Inc. jumped 6 percent to $30.93 after the software maker reported earnings that were much stronger than analysts had expected. The company also raised its forecast for earnings and revenue in the current quarter.
Another technology company, Jabil Circuit Inc., soared 10.7 percent to $19.55 after its income more than tripled on stronger revenue. Jabil, which makes parts for electronics and other technology companies, also issued a higher earnings and revenue forecast.
CarMax Inc. slumped 7.6 percent to $33.17. The used car dealership chain said its expenses jumped 14 percent last quarter as the company paid more for sales commissions and advertising.
Bond prices were relatively flat. The yield on the 10-year Treasury note edged down to 3.30 percent from 3.35 percent late Monday.
The euro fell against the dollar after Portugal became the latest European country to be warned of a possible credit rating downgrade.
More than two stocks rose for every one that fell on the New York Stock Exchange. Consolidated trading volume was 3.5 billion shares.
Markets will be closed Friday in observance of Christmas.

description.hltext_display: Jon Bartlett appointed GM of Hotel Andra, Seattle
description.content:
- Jon Bartlett has been named General Manager of the Hotel Andra in Seattle, Washington. With over 12 years experience in the hospitality industry, Mr. Bartlett has held positions at the Hotel Monaco Chicago, Hotel Vintage Park, and Hotel Bellevue, Inn at the Market and the Renaissance Seattle. He is a graduate of Central Washington University.
About Hotel Ändra
An urban neighborhood hotel, the 119 room Hotel Ändra has a unique design and attitude that reflects the Northwest, yet offers a progressive and contemporary twist. The Scandinavian design elements – such as the hot orange Arne Jacobsen chairs in the living room loft, the use of minimalist wood and the celebration of water – all are a tribute to the strong Scandinavian heritage which is prevalent in the Seattle area.
The Hotel Ändra is located at 2000 Fourth Avenue in Seattle’s Midtown neighborhood. It is a member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World brand, a collection of over 500 independently-owned exclusive hotels located in more than 70 countries around the globe. In addition, the Hotel is a proud partner of Stash Hotel Rewards™, enabling guests to quickly earn free nights at distinctive, independent hotels without blackouts or inflexible category restrictions. Guests can easily sign up for a free account at the Stash website www.stashrewards.com.
Reservations can be made by calling the hotel directly at 800.448.8601 or through the hotel website at www.hotelandra.com, or at the Small Luxury Hotel reservation desk by calling toll-free 800.525.4800 or through the Internet at www.slh.com. Travel agents can use the GDS code LX for LuXury.

entity.property: Small Luxury Hotels of the World

description.content: 价小幅走高，最新报4.70港元，上涨1.51%，暂成交176万元。高盛发表报告称，将深高速的H股及A股评级，分别由中性升至买入；H股目标价由3.9港元升至5.5港元；A股目标价则由人民币4.3元，升至人民币5.8元。报告指，深高速11下半年度盈利可望复苏，主要受惠于清连高速与其他公路连结、及毛利率提升；把其10-12年度每股盈利预测上调16%/0%/9%；指该股11年度市帐率仅1倍，估值吸引。

description.hltext_display: Spórol az önkormányzat
description.content:
Csökkentett munkaidővel és szénszünettel spórolnak fűtési költségeiken a hédervári, a lipóti és a mecséri önkormányzati iskolákban, óvodákban.
Juhász József hédervári polgármester a Magyar Rádió győri regionális adóján kedden elhangzott interjúban elmondta: évi 8-9 millió forintot fordítanak intézményeik fűtésére, ezekkel az intézkedésekkel mintegy 10 százalékos megtakarítást érhetnek el.
Közlése szerint az önkormányzat öt helyett heti négy napban lesz nyitva januárban és februárban, az iskolában egy héttel megtoldják a téli szünetet februárban. A polgármester arról beszélt: korábban olaj-, majd gázfűtésre álltak át, jövőre már pellettel fűtenének, ha nyernek rá pénzt pályázaton.
Forrás: MTI

description.hltext_display: 波司登涨6.82% 高盛上调评级至买入
description.content:
价上扬，最新报3.29港元，上涨6.82%，暂成交9650万元。高盛发表报告称，将波司登的评级由中性调高至买进，维持目标价在4.20港元不变。该行称，过去10个交易日波司登的股价下跌了22%，因为外界担心受暖冬影响，羽绒服的零售库存将居高不下，还担心波司登母公司对太阳能项目的投资。
该行认为，对上述两个因素的担心已经过度，并且该股最近下跌可能提供了买进的机会。该行预计，2010年冬季的羽绒服销量将增加39%，波司登母公司对太阳能项目的投资对其上市公司的经营基本不会产生影响。

description.hltext_display: From Bozeman to Boston, Patriots’ Fletcher was a hit
description.author: Glen Farley
description.content:
The textbook play prompted a series of text messages.
As he dressed in the Patriots locker room at Gillette Stadium late Sunday night, linebacker Dane Fletcher answered occasional questions from reporters and frequent messages to his cell phone. ?I got a few texts,? Fletcher said following his team?s hard-fought 31-27 victory over the Green Bay Packers. ?My family?s pretty excited. Everybody was watching. That helps out, knowing all my friends and family are watching.? From Bozeman (Montana) to Boston, Fletcher?s ratings were good on Sunday night.
If Tully Banta-Cain?s fumble-forcing sack of Matt Flynn on fourth-and-1 from the New England 15 as time expired was the game-cinching play, Fletcher?s 8-yard sack on first-and-10 from the 24 as the clock dipped under a minute was the game-swaying play.
Not only did that sack put the Pack in second-and-long, it prompted its inexperienced quarterback to burn his last timeout, leading to the utter chaos that ensued when the team was able to snap the ball only three times in the last 53 seconds. ?I feel like we have depth everywhere,? said Fletcher, one of the unsung heroes ? Dan Connolly and Kyle Arrington were a couple of others ? to step up for the Patriots as they staved off an upset bid. ?When they call upon guys like us to come in and make plays and we do, it?s a privilege to get in there and second of all do your job. So we all pretty much stepped up and did our jobs.? As he lined up across from the Packers at the New England 24, with his team protecting a four-point lead with 1:05 to play, Fletcher?s eyes had the look of a Christmas tree to them.
They lit up. ?I played D-end in college so I kind of had that feeling,? said Fletcher. ?You never know for sure, but I had a good feeling on that play.? Fletcher?s good feeling led to an even better result ? the sack of Flynn that put the Packers in the second-and-long predicament from which they were unable to escape. ?It looked like a man (to man) scheme as far as the O-line,? said Fletcher. ?The tackle (Bryan Bulaga) went down on our end and the guard (Josh Sitton) pulled out for me. I got a decent jump off the ball.? That sequence capped off a productive night for Fletcher, who was a force in the Packers? pocket, registering two tackles with the first sack of his career as well as being credited with two quarterback hits.
And even as Banta-Cain turned in the game-cinching play my closing on Flynn from behind, take a look at the replay: There was Fletcher, closing in from the front, causing some indecision on the quarterback?s part. Surely, Fletcher?s performance has been a topic of discussion this week at the Cannery Lounge & Package Liquor, the bar his parents, Bob and Kathy, have owned on Bozeman?s West Main Street for nearly three decades and Burger Bob?s, the restaurant they?ve operated next door since 1995.
All in all, not bad for a 6-foot-2, 244-pound product of Montana State who reported to Foxboro as an undrafted free agent in the summer.
Fletcher may have been the reigning defensive MVP of the Big Sky Conference, but he was no star in the eyes of the NFL. ?I think everybody?s disappointed when they don?t get drafted,? said Fletcher, ?but you look in the grand scheme of things and being a free agent wasn?t so bad for me. I got to pick the greatest team to be on for me. It definitely worked out. I?m definitely happy being here. ?I was looking at playing football and playing on the best team and this is definitely the best team and the best organization as far as I?m concerned. (Going to camp) was great and to make the roster and play on, fight on, it?s an absolute privilege.? There have been adjustments, to be sure, in making the transition from an end in the Big Sky to a linebacker in football?s big league. ?I would just say the mental aspect of the game (is the biggest adjustment),? said Fletcher. ?Going from college, especially Div. 1-AA, to the NFL, I feel I was in a fast conference before, but between the mental aspect of the game and going from d-end it was definitely a little change and I?m still working on it.? Fletcher has produced well enough to be put on the field with the game on the line, as was the case on Sunday night. ?That why I came here ? to play hard,? said Fletcher. ?I?m happy with the way I?m playing, but never content.?

description.hltext_display: Sioux Falls must pay $10,877 for sewage dump
description.author: Megan Luther
description.content:
The city of Sioux Falls will pay a $10,877 penalty and might face future fines if it falls out of compliance with the South Dakota Department of Environment and Natural Resources.The fine stems from multiple times this year when the city released a total of 65.3 million gallons of treated and partially treated sewage.
It's the largest discharge of sewage Surface Water Quality Administrator Jeanne Goodman has seen in her 30 years with the DENR. It's also the first penalty of this magnitude that the city has faced because of sanitary sewer issues, said city Environmental Manager Bob Kappal, who has been with Sioux Falls government for more than 25 years.The settlement and DENR orders released Tuesday show the magnitude of the city's releases since the first occurred in March.With record rainfall and saturated grounds, Mayor Mike Huether said the releases were unavoidable."We did it to prevent personal injury, severe property damage and the potential for extreme health and sanitary issues for Sioux Falls," he said.
The city was notified of the violations from the state Dec 6.Monday evening, Huether signed a settlement agreement which stated, among other things, that the city must pay the penalty and take specified steps to prevent the problem for happening again."I think, ultimately, it shows we were all working in the spirit of doing what is right not only for Sioux Falls, but South Dakota and, of course, trying to protect the environment we all care about," he said.City Councilor Greg Jamison hopes it never happens again."If I could, I would like to buy everyone lunch down river to show that we are sorry for what we did," he said.
"We want to acknowledge it and try to make it right."Monday, the council approved new bonds to be issued to expedite $26 million in infrastructure improvements to the Central Main Sewer System.The project originally was scheduled for 2012 and 2013.Now, Sioux Falls Public Works Director Mark Cotter hopes the almost three-mile sewer line project is wrapped up before fall.The city has a large incentive.
It will be fined $1,000 for each day it discharges into the Big Sioux River from now through July 1, 2012.Goodman said the city is working to minimize the potential for this happening again."The city has stepped up to the plate," she said.While the tens of millions of gallons was a large amount, the very rain that caused the overload of the city's sewer system also helped to dilute the waste in the Big Sioux."A bit of a saving grace at the time, there was considerable more water in the river when it happened," said Jay Gilbertson, District Manager of East Dakota Water Development District, a sub-unit of state government.
Because bacteria don't tend to last long, Gilbertson said the lasting implications of the sewage dump will be in public relations."Probably the biggest lasting impact would simply be the notoriety, the publicity, that came from it," he said.Reach reporter Megan Luther at 331-2318.

description.hltext_display: Police: Woman stabbed over $10 debt (270)
description.content:
Y -- A woman is recovering from a stab wound to her liver after police say a 24-year-old man sank a steak knife into her stomach while trying to collect a $10 debt.
Police arrested Robert "Black Rob" King, who witnesses told police had been living in a halfway house, charging him with stabbing 30-year-old Kristen Severino while she was inside her Linden Street apartment last week.
King came to Severino's apartment on Dec. 18, and witnesses said he forced everyone in the home into a bedroom, then threatened them with a knife as he demanded money he said he was owed.
When Severino stood up from a radiator she was seated on, King stabbed her three times, twice in the side and once in the stomach, witnesses told police according to court documents.

One of the worst incidents of metal conducting a lightning bolt was in July 1955 at the Royal Ascot races. Lightning ripped along metal railings in a series of blue sparks, injuring forty-five people and killing two.

In Sweden in the Middle Ages, a mayor was once elected by a louse. The candidates rested their beards on a table and the louse was placed in the middle. The louse's chosen host was elected mayor.

description.hltext_display: Rengeteg szülőt érint majd a kedvezmény
description.content:
Mentesül a személyi jövedelemadó megfizetése alól jövőre az egygyermekes szülők 58 százaléka, a kétgyermekesek 68 százaléka és a háromgyermekesek 98 százaléka, összesen 621 ezer szülő.
Mentesül a személyi jövedelemadó megfizetése alól jövőre az egygyermekes szülők 58 százaléka, a kétgyermekesek 68 százaléka és a háromgyermekesek 98 százaléka, összesen 621 ezer szülő - írja a Magyar Nemzet a szerdai számában.
A 2011 január elsején életbe lépő új adórendszer gyermekkedvezményei miatt 621 ezer szülőnek nem kell majd szja-t fizetnie - ismerteti a lap a Nemzetgazdasági Minisztériumtól kapott adatokat. Jövőre 456 ezer egygyermekes szülő dolgozhat majd bejelentett módon, és az érintettek közterhét - az adójóváírás mellett - a gyermekkedvezmény évente 120 ezer forinttal mérsékli.
Valószínűsíthető - írja a Magyar Nemzet -, hogy 2011-ben 369 ezer kétgyermekes szülő vállal majd munkát legálisan. Ők évente 240 ezer forint adókedvezményt kapnak. A szaktárca számításai szerint közülük 252 ezernek nem kell majd szja-t fizetnie.
A munkáltatók feltételezhetően 106 ezer három gyereket nevelő szülőt jelentenek be, akik 1,18 millió forint szja-megfizetésétől mentesülnek.
Forrás: MTI

description.hltext_display: Fitch dreigt met verlaging kredietrating Griekenland
description.content:
Laatste kredietbeoordelaar met investment grade rating dreigt Griekenlands kredietwaardigheid te verlagen naar junk.
Kredietbeoordelaar Fitch dreigt de kredietrating van Griekenland te verlagen naar junk. Fitch heeft de BBB- beoordeling van het Zuid-Europese land onder herziening geplaatst vanwege twijfels over de houdbaarheid van de bezuinigingen. In ruil voor noodleningen van de EU en het IMF heeft Griekenland beloofd het begrotingstekort terug te brengen van 15,4 procent in 2009 tot 3 procent in 2014. De bezuinigingen gaan gepaard met een sterke krimp van de Griekse economie, waardoor de schuldenlast van het land relatief alleen maar toeneemt. In 2014 bedraagt de staatsschuld van het land volgens de Europese Commissie 156 procent van het BBP, vergeleken met iets meer dan 100 procent voor het uitbreken van de crisis. De Commissie verwacht een krimp van de Griekse economie dit jaar van 4,2 procent, gevolgd door een krimp van 3,0 procent in 2011.
Fitch is de laatste van de drie kredietbeoordelaars met een investment grade beoordeling van de Griekse kredietwaardigheid.
Door: Arne Petimezas, ABM Financial News.

description.hltext_display: "Ban On Chloroquine Still In Force"
description.content:
Mr Kwame Dzudzorli Gakpey, Communication Officer of the National Malaria Control Programme of the Ghana Health Service (GHS), has warned that the national ban on chloroquine for the treatment of malaria is still in force.
He said the GHS in collaboration with the Food and Drugs Board, the Pharmacy Council and the Police would next year visit pharmacy shops and other drug stores, especially those in rural areas, to arrest dealers still selling the drug.
Mr Gakpey gave the warning when he addressed media practitioners at a days workshop organised by the GHS with support from Promoting Malaria Prevention and Treatment (Prompt Ghana) in Sunyani on Monday. The workshop was aimed at updating the knowledge of over 50 participants drawn from the electronic and print media on effective reportage on malaria.
Mr Gakpey noted with regret that even though the ban on chloroquine came into force in 2004 some pharmacy shops still sold the drug to ignorant malaria patients. The efficacy and potency of chloroquine is no more since the parasite that causes malaria has developed resistance to the banned medicine, he added.
Mr Gakpey reminded the public that artesunate amodiaqiune (AA) is the best drug recommended by the GHS for the treatment of malaria and advised patients of the ailment to take AA in the full course as prescribed by the medical specialist for the rapid treatment of malaria.
Giving a national overview of malaria, the Communication Officer said the disease was the number one cause of morbidity, accounting for about 32.5 per cent of all outpatients illnesses, 35.9 per cent of all admissions and 30.3 of all deaths in children aged less than five years.
He said between 3.1 and 3.5 million cases of clinical malaria were reported in public health facilities each year of which 900,000 cases were of children under five years. Mr Gakpey mentioned fever, headache, chills and vomiting as some of the common symptoms of malaria and advised the general public to access prompt medical attention if they experience such signs. The use of lasting insecticide mosquito treated nets is also one of the best methods to control the spread and prevention of malaria, he advised.
Ms Rosemary Ardayfio, a media consultant for Prompt Ghana and a facilitator at the workshop, noted that malaria places a huge burden on Ghanas economic development. She urged the participants especially those from the electronic media to help to change the behaviour of the public on malaria. Ms Ardayfio said the media plays a critical role in the fight against malaria. Story from peacefmonline.com News:

description.content:
股价反弹，据《华尔街日报》报道，传澳门政府驳回澳博(00880)路(乙水)地皮申请，澳博股价上两个交易日急跌，而今日则高见12.04元，一度升9.26%，最新报11.96元，升0.94%，成交额1.12亿元。

description.hltext_display: Halálos baleset Kecelen
description.content:
Kecskemét, 2010. december 22., szerda (MTI) - A helyszínen meghalt a kisteherautó 53 éves utasa, amikor a gépjármű egy álló kamionba rohant Kecelen szerdán hajnalban - közölte a rendőrség.
Az érsekcsanádi férfi holttestét a tűzoltók feszítő és vágó eszközök segítségével tudták kivenni az összeroncsolódott gépkocsiból - mondta a Bács-Kiskun Megyei Rendőr-főkapitányság szóvivője.
Mihályné Bornemisza Eleonóra őrnagy hozzátette: a kisteherautót vezető 66 éves érsekcsanádi férfi csak könnyű sérüléseket szenvedett.
Forrás: MTI

description.hltext_display: BAM bouwt drie scholen in Londen
description.content:
FinanciÃ«le overeenstemming over de opdracht van 90 miljoen euro is inmiddels bereikt.
London Borough of Camden Council en BAM hebben financiële overeenstemming bereikt over de totstandkoming van drie scholen in Camden. Dit meldde het bouwbedrijf woensdag in een persbericht. Met de bouw is een investering gemoeid van circa 90 miljoen euro. De financiering wordt verstrekt door Aviva. De bouwwerkzaamheden gaan direct van start. De oplevering van de eerste school is voorzien in juni 2012.
Door: Max Steenwijk, ABM Financial News.

description.hltext_display: Talk of the Town: Nation's fate at risk if we don't make cuts
description.content: The Nov. 13 Courier editorial starts out well in its position that the national debt is a huge, shared problem requiring shared sacrifice, but it ends poorly with a statement that the "vulnerable always seem to be in the line of fire."

description.hltext_display: Nem jár a szentendrei HÉV
description.content:
Műszaki hiba miatt nem közlekedik a szentendrei HÉV - közölte Herceg Zoltán, a BKV fődiszpécsere.
A fődiszpécser elmondta, hogy a Batthyány tér ás Békásmegyer között üzemkezdettől csak autóbuszok járnak, ezekkel pótolják a kieső HÉV-szerelvényeket.
A műszaki hibáról a fődiszpécser nem tudott bővebb tájékoztatatást adni; az MTI úgy tudja, hogy nincs áram a HÉV felsővezetékében.
Forrás: MTI

description.hltext_display: PATRIOTS NOTEBOOK: Edelman, Price have yet to come in handy
description.author: Glen Farley
description.content:
It?s been a sophomore jinx type of season for Julian Edelman. It?s been a redshirt season for Taylor Price. No question, it?s been a step-back season for Edelman, who has struggled to hold on to the ball after making a rather seamless transition from Kent State quarterback to New England Patriots wide receiver with 37 receptions his rookie year.
One of a handful of Patriots to show up for their 33-14 postseason loss to Baltimore, Edelman accounted for both of his team?s touchdowns in that game.
Edelman has just four receptions for 14 yards this season, the latest example of his struggles occurring last Sunday night when another pass from Tom Brady ? albeit a ball that was a bit high ? ricocheting off his hands during the Patriots? 31-27 victory over Green Bay at Gillette Stadium. ?Julian has had some drops during the last couple times out,? Patriots wide receivers coach Chad O?Shea acknowledged during a conference call on Tuesday. ?I know he is going to work real hard to try to correct that and, specifically, catch the ball, which I know he will work hard to do.? Price, it seems, has been in catch-up mode since the NCAA?s graduation rule forced him to miss a lot of spring work while he was still at Ohio and he?s yet to catch on. Fourteen games into the season, Price, the Patriots? third-round pick in the April draft, has yet to make his NFL debut. Which doesn?t equate to a lost season for Price, according to O?Shea. ?Behind the scenes, Taylor is working extremely hard right now,? said O?Shea. ?He?s doing what we ask him to do, which is go to practice and try to get better every day. That?s what he?s done. ?He?s got some great receivers, in my opinion, in front of him that he can learn from and if he does so, he?ll continue to progress. All that we ask of him is to keep working hard, and I think he has worked hard.? Leonard out: Multiple reports on Tuesday night indicated that the Patriots have waived Louis Leonard.
Health concerns in the defensive line prompted the team to sign Leonard as an insurance policy last week. Chasing 1,000: In his quest for 1,000 yards, BenJarvus Green-Ellis will shuffle off to Buffalo.
If Green-Ellis (824 yards) is to become the first Patriots running back to reach the plateau since Corey Dillon gained a franchise-record 1,635 yards in 2004, he could take a major step forward at Ralph Wilson Stadium on Sunday afternoon.
Although the Buffalo defense limited the Miami Dolphins to 65 yards rushing in its best effort of the season last Sunday, it ranks dead last in the NFL in that department this season, yielding 158.6 yards per game.
The first time the two teams met this season, a 38-30 New England win at Gillette Stadium back on Sept. 26, the Patriots amassed 200 yards on 38 carries (both season highs). Green-Ellis carried 16 times for 98 yards and one of his 12 TDs this season in that game.
Back then, the Bills relied on a 3-4 scheme. Midway through the season, they resorted back more to their old 4-3. Green-Ellis? current total of 824 yards gives him the second-most productive season by a Patriots running back since 2004 ? second only to the 835 Laurence Maroney gained in 2007.
The Patriots will wrap up the season on Jan. 2 at Gillette Stadium against the Dolphins, who are allowing just 96.6 yards rushing per game this year, sixth in the league.

description.hltext_display: 雪佛兰全系车型闪耀签售现场-生活新报网
description.content:
总有一款适合你
雪佛兰全系车型闪耀签售现场
赛场得意的雪佛兰科鲁兹，上市以来市场表现一路凯歌高奏，更让人兴奋的是，雪佛兰进口新SPARK即将登陆云南市场。本周末，云南立华云行总经理签售活动即将拉开序幕，届时，雪佛兰全系车型将为消费者带来惊喜和最优实惠。签售之前，不妨先提前领略一下雪佛兰全系车型的魅力。
SPARK斯帕可
作为一款充满灵感的个性化高端微车，全新SPARK集颠覆传统的造型设计、丰富多样的功能性配备以及高效环保的燃油经济性于一身，看似?微?不足道，却淋漓尽致地凸显了雪佛兰运动风格的造型设计、富有驾驶乐趣的操控性能和环保节能的未来科技三大产品设计理念。
与传统小车相比，雪佛兰全新SPARK以1.0升绿色排量引领汽车时代的环保潮流，低碳但不低调，为推崇个体独特性的前沿年轻群体，提供了个性化的私人车内空间，在满足潮人先锋对于环保苛刻要求的同时，尽享雪佛兰独有的驾驶性能和乐趣。
科鲁兹
2011款雪佛兰科鲁兹在原先配置上也进行了大幅提升，所有自动挡车型都配备了EPS电动随速助力转向和四向可调方向盘。同时，1.6T涡轮增压车型及1.6 SE AT、1.8 SE AT、1.8 SX AT共四款车型还首次引入了安吉星智能行车伙伴，不但使科鲁兹在科技含量、安全性等方面领跑同级车，也让科鲁兹车主能享受到更富乐趣、更多便捷的超值服务。
科鲁兹全新搭载的1.6T涡轮增压发动机具有高性能、轻量化、超耐久的优异特质，科鲁兹1.6T在起步、提速、中段加速、高速行驶再加速各个阶段都能获得源源不断的动力。
乐风
雪佛兰乐风LOVA，是一款为中国消费者打造的小车，如其命名一样，正是要印证?知本一族?对生活的热爱、对自我的坚持和对明天的渴望。
雪佛兰乐风LOVA虽然是一款小排量的小型车，却融合了诸多高档三厢轿车的设计精髓，乐风以大设计、大空间、大动力和大品牌，实现了时尚和实用的完美结合，使其真正成为了精品家轿的典范。
2011款景程
2011款景程有着2700mm的轴距，接近中高级车的?身材?，令其拥有同级别车型首屈一指的超大空间。
2011款景程搭载了全新1.8L Ecotec DVVT发动机，作为通用全球全新战略发动机，其最大功率和最大扭矩分别达到105kw和177Nm，2800转即可达到90%最大扭矩输出。
新赛欧以?全民理想家轿?之名回归，新赛欧凭借国际品质、大空间、高安全、低油耗赢得了消费者、尤其是首次购车的新城市普通家庭的关注。新赛欧两厢沿袭了三厢产品的核心优势，同时外形更时尚，储物空间也更灵活丰富。潮味十足的Boxy方形设计，让新赛欧两厢实现了车内空间的最大化，后座头部空间提升至965mm，在同级车中优势明显。
科帕奇雪佛兰Captiva科帕奇的?全路况?特性源于雪佛兰领先的SUV科技：3.2升V6高性能全铝发动机的强大功率或2.4升直列四缸发动机的低转速高扭矩，澎湃动力源源不断，保证车辆在任何路面上都拥有始终强劲的动力。
本版文图 云南立华云行

description.hltext_display: US suits against Pakistani spy chief face hurdles
description.content:
The plaintiffs in two U.S. lawsuits accusing Pakistan's spy chief of nurturing terrorists involved in the 2008 Mumbai attacks are hoping for a historic outcome recalling the Lockerbie settlement, but they would have to overcome serious legal obstacles first, lawyers and experts say.
The civil complaints naming Gen. Ahmed Shuja Pasha and his Inter-Services Intelligence agency as defendants are like past lawsuits filed in federal courts against overseas figures with alleged links to terrorist attacks and other atrocities.
A lawyer for the U.S. plaintiffs, John Kreindler, said Tuesday that they hope to win a deal like the one struck with Libya over the 1988 bombing of Pan Am Flight 103 over Lockerbie, Scotland. The $1.5 billion settlement announced in 2008 was seen both as a victory for the families of 180 Americans killed in the terrorist attack and as a diplomatic breakthrough with the North African nation, once a pariah.
"The hope is to obtain appropriate compensation, but we also see it as a chance for the United States and Pakistan to join together and condemn terrorism," he said.
"I think our chances are very good," he added. "We wouldn't be doing it if it was simply for show."
But experts say a U.S. court could find that Pasha, as a high-ranking foreign official, is protected by sovereign immunity. Even when not protected, many international defendants don't bother to respond to summonses and, as a result, never see the inside of an American courthouse or engage in settlement negotiations.
Judges can hear testimony from the plaintiffs and order damages, but the chances of collecting are a long shot. In some cases, judges have tossed out cases after the U.S. government opposed them on diplomatic grounds.
"Lawsuits like this aren't highly successful," said John F. Murphy, a professor at Villanova University School of Law in suburban Philadelphia. "Decisions that have been favorable to the plaintiffs have been largely symbolic."
In Pakistan, prominent lawyer Athar Minallah said Tuesday that with the U.S. court's jurisdiction in question, he couldn't see the litigation getting very far.
"Why should they even bother to respond?" Minallah said of Pasha and the ISI.
An ISI representative said Tuesday that Pasha had received a summons but declined to discuss the case further.
The wrongful death lawsuits were filed last month in federal court in Brooklyn by relatives of victims in the Mumbai attacks, which left 166 people and nine attackers dead. The assault has been blamed on the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba, which is also named as a defendant.

description.author: webmaster@folkbladet.se
description.content:
Tiina får ersättning för alla förseningar hon drabbats av
NORRKÖPING Tiina Mauritzell tröttnade på Östgötatrafikens ständiga tågförseningar. Hon vände sig till Allmänna reklamationsnämnden, ARN, med sina klagomål. ARN ger Tiina rätt och anser att Östgötatrafiken ska kompensera henne ekonomiskt med 650 kronor.

description.hltext_display: Slutt for Solskjærs akademi
description.content:
Ole Gunnar Solskjær skal ikke lenger arrangere fotballskole i Kristiansund.
Tips en venn på e-post:
Din kommentar
Del på nettet:
Solskjær har samarbeidet med Statoil om fotballskolen i åtte år, men nå er det slutt, skriver Tidens Krav.
I stedet flyttes akademiet til Stavanger, og Brede Hangeland blir ny frontfigur.
– Det er lite vi kan gjøre med dette, men det er klart det er synd, sier styreleder Leif Svoren i Clausenengen, som har vært med på å arrangere fotballskolen.
Solskjær starter i jobben som manager i Molde 10. januar. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: `Carlyle wil AlpInvest overnemen`
description.content:
Het Amerikaanse Carlyle kan mogelijk volgende maand al AlpInvest overnemen.
Het Amerikaanse Carlyle Group is dichtbij een overname van private equity fonds AlpInvest Parnters, dat belegt voor pensioenfondsen ABP en PFZW. Dat meldt Bloomberg op basis van drie bronnen. Carlyle, een van de grootste private fondsen ter wereld, kan volgens de bronnen mogelijk al volgende maand de deal afronden.
Carlyle overziet 98 miljard dollar aan vermogen, vergeleken met 52 miljard dollar voor AlpInvest.
Begin deze maand meldde Bloomberg Businessweek dat Carlyle naar de beurs wil.
Door: Arne Petimezas, ABM Financial News.

description.hltext_display: Megvan az ünnepi menetrend
description.content:
Rendkívüli menetrend lép életbe a MÁV-nál, a Volánbusznál és a BKV-nál karácsonykor, szilveszterkor, illetve a két ünnep között.
A Volánbusz december 24-én a szabadnapi, 25-én a munkaszüneti napi, 26-án pedig a vasárnapi menetrend szerint közlekedteti járatait. December 24-én az utolsó buszjáratok Budapestről általában délután 4 és 5 óra között indulnak el.
A két ünnep között a tanítási szünetes munkanapra vonatkozó menetrend lesz érvényben, így egyes vonalakon kevesebb járat közlekedik. December 31-én a tanítási szünetes pénteki, január elsején pedig a munkaszüneti napi menetrend szerint közlekednek a Volánbusz járatai. Az ország többi Volán társaságánál ugyanez a menetrend lesz érvényben.
A MÁV 23-án a pénteki, 24-én a szombati, 25-én az ünnepnapi menetrend szerint közlekedteti szerelvényeit. Azokon a vonalakon, amelyeken nagyobb utasforgalom várható, több kocsival indítják el a vonatokat. A vasúttársaság azt javasolja az utazóknak, hogy a sorban állás elkerüléséért interneten, vagy elővételben vegyék meg a jegyeket. A szilveszteri és az újévi közlekedési rend nem változik, minden nap az előzetesen meghirdetett menetrend lesz érvényben.
A BKV járatai december 24-én (pénteken) szombati közlekedési rend szerint, de rövidebb üzemidővel közlekednek. A nappali járatok 16 óra körül indulnak utoljára, ezután az ilyenkor szokásos módon az éjszakai buszokkal lehet utazni.
Karácsony napjain, december 25-én és 26-án a munkaszüneti, illetve az áruházakat érintő autóbuszok az állami ünnepnapokon érvényes menetrend szerint közlekednek. A két ünnep között, december 27-31-éig az iskolaszünet idején érvényes munkanapi menetrendek lesznek érvényben, Szilveszter éjjel az éjszakai járatok - néhány kivétellel - kétszeres sűrűséggel járnak.
Forrás: MTI

description.hltext_display: 加成品油价中石化涨3% 高盛重申“买入”
description.content:
布，自今日(22日)零时起上调成品油价，汽油及柴油每吨分别提高310元人民币及300元人民币，即汽油及柴油每升分别加价0.23元人民币及0.26元人民币。
高盛表示，尽避在原油价格上升下，加油价於成品油定价机制下属合理，该行原先并不预期本月会加价，亦相信为市场预期之内，因为通胀正上升，尤其内地11月消费物价指数按升年5.1%，为过去28个月最高。该行认为，此证明发改委将坚持根据成品油机制而加价，并恢复投资者信心。同时，亦相信此为进一步改革的一个积极信号。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
高盛估计，内地12月炼油毛利每桶约6.5美元，相信明年1月应可达7美元。今年平均炼油毛利每桶5美元应可达到，其维持明年每桶5美元毛利预测。
在内地油企中，该行续认为中石化(00386.HK)(“买入”，目标价9.7元；A股为确信买入名单，目标价11.8元人民币)优於中石油(00857.HK)(“沽售”，目标价8.3元；A股目标价10.1元人民币)，因为前者炼油毛利应有惊喜，相信盈利有较大上升空间。中石化会较受惠成品油机制及资源税改革。
中石化H股近月屡受制7.5元；今早高见7.49元，现升3.3%，报7.46元；A股靠稳报8.29元人民币。

description.hltext_display: 广州车展 萌“复古”推“绿色”-生活新报网
description.content:
12月20日，第八届中国广州国际汽车展览会拉开帷幕，本次展会不仅创下了历届之最，同时参展商、采购商和新车发布数量也都创下了历史新高，受到了国内外汽车行业的空前关注。各大汽车厂商近50场现场新车发布更是吸引了国内外近6000名媒体到场。
据统计，本届广州车展有全球首发车5辆、中国市场首发车45辆，创下了历届广州车展的新纪录。20日（媒体日），21款新车宣布上市并公布售价。本届广州车展以?领先科技，共创未来?为主题，在今年中国汽车市场产值蝉联全球第一的大背景下，本届车展受到了国内外汽车行业的空前关注，参展商、采购商和新车发布数量都创历史新高。

description.hltext_display: Még tart a szmogriadó
description.content:
Továbbra is indokolt a kedden elrendelt szmogriadó tájékoztatási fokozatának fenntartása a budapesti szállópor-szennyezettségről mért adatok alapján - közölte a Főpolgármesteri Hivatal szerdán hajnalban.
A fővárosban nem csökkent jelentősen a szállópor-koncentráció, és a légszennyezettségi állapotot mérő műszerek ellenőrzött adatai alapján a kisméretű szállópor (PM10) négy helyen - Széna tér, Teleki tér, Kőrakás park és Erzsébet tér - meghaladta a tájékoztatási küszöbértéket.
A szállópor koncentrációja ugyanakkor egyetlen mérőállomáson sem lépte túl a riasztási küszöbértéket, így Budapesten továbbra sem kell elrendelni a szmogriadó riasztási fokozatát.
Az MTI-hez eljuttatott közleményben Tarlós István főpolgármester köszönetét fejezte ki azoknak, akik (különösen a rendszámtáblán fekete és piros színű, hatszögletű környezetvédelmi plakettel ellátott gépjárművek üzembentartóinak) korlátozzák autóhasználatukat, valamint az ipari vállalkozásoknak, amelyek önkéntesen korlátozzák a légszennyező forrásaik kibocsátását.
A közlemény hangsúlyozza: Budapest vezetése továbbra is számít a fővárosiak együttműködésére abban, hogy a fővárosi szmoghelyzet romlása, a korlátozó intézkedések bevezetése elkerülhető legyen - áll a közleményben.
A frissülő információk a Budapest Portálon (www.budapest.hu) és a Fővárosi Önkormányzat twitter oldalán is elérhetőek: http://twitter.com/budapestfovaros
A szmogriadóval kapcsolatban további tájékoztatást a Főpolgármesteri Hivatal munkaideje alatt az Ügyfélszolgálati Irodán (Tel: 327-1504; e-mail: ügyfelszolgalat@budapest.hu), munkaidőn kívül a Fővárosi Közterület-felügyelet Vészhelyzeti Információs Központja 0-24 órás Ügyeletén (tel: 301-7535) adnak.
Forrás: MTI

description.hltext_display: Phila. schools facing big budget shortfall
description.author: Jeff Shields and Kristen A. Graham
description.content:
Philadelphia School District officials are staring down a gap of $430 million or more in next year's budget, and the deficit could surpass the half-billion mark under worst-case scenarios, according to officials briefed on the district's finances.
In October, the district's chief financial officer, Michael Masch, warned the public that the 2011-12 budget could be grim, with $234 million in stimulus money drying up without funds to replace it.
Additional costs for staffing, health benefits and charter schools have made the situation worse, according to one of the sources briefed on the looming crisis. Each district department head may be asked to come up with reduction proposals of 12 percent, 24 percent, and 36 percent, according to another source.
The $430 million is more than 13 percent of the 2010-11 $3.2 billion budget. The gap could grow with additional state cuts and maximum enrollment at charter schools.
Mayor Nutter and School Superintendent Arlene Ackerman said in a hastily arranged conference call Tuesday night that they did not know the amount the district would need to make up in next year's budget. Ackerman called any figures other than the stimulus money "purely speculative." "I don't feel comfortable actually discussing this with the press, beyond the $234 million, as we are internally trying to look at a variety of scenarios," Ackerman said. "I really think it's unfair to report on budget exercises that may or may not be going on here." Nutter and Ackerman called the news conference after The Inquirer began asking questions about the budget. "We don't want to spend a lot of time speculating," the mayor said, acknowledging that the district, "like every other governmental entity, has some budget challenges." Referring to his budget proposal and that of Gov.-elect Tom Corbett, Nutter added: "There are a series of unknowns that won't be resolved or get additional clarity for weeks." Both budgets are expected in early March.
For two years, the district has relied on federal stimulus money and hefty aid packages from Harrisburg to balance its budget. Of the current $3.2 billion spending plan, $1.68 billion - 55 percent - comes from state aid.
An additional $234 million came from nonrecurring federal stimulus money that expires this year.
With the first Republican governor in eight years taking office in January, and staunch district ally Rep. Dwight Evans (D., Phila.) out as ranking Democrat in the House Appropriations Committee, the district could be in a tight spot.
In October, Masch warned the School Reform Commission - the state-appointed board overseeing district finances - that "some very tough budget decisions" were "inevitable" in the 2011-12 budget.
Referencing only the evaporating stimulus money at the time, he said his plan would try to minimize cuts to instruction and other initiatives credited for raising test scores for eight-plus years.
Nutter and Ackerman on Tuesday emphasized the eight years of gains in test scores and increases in graduation rates as evidence that federal and state money has been well invested in the district. "We want to make sure that programs that serve students, and serve them well, are not impacted," Nutter said. The School District raises about $600 million each year from its share of property taxes. The district has approached the city about raising an additional $54 million by increasing its share of the property tax pie from about 55 percent to 60 percent, according to a source with knowledge of the district's budget.
But political observers question whether the city could afford to give the district extra funding after two years of tax hikes and austere budgets. Nutter said the district had not asked for a funding increase.
School Reform Commissioner David F. Girard-diCarlo foreshadowed the crisis in May, when he only "reluctantly" supported the district's 2010-11 budget and said he feared for the district's financial future.
At the time, Girard-diCarlo said a "potential financial tsunami of almost biblical proportion" could loom. On Tuesday, Girard-diCarlo said it was too early to put a hard number on the looming budget deficit, before the new governor has taken office or Nutter has presented his budget. "We do not yet know the parameters of our governmental revenue," Girard-diCarlo said in an e-mail. "It would be irresponsible to not do some modeling given the realities facing the new [governor] and the elimination of the Fed's stimulus money. What will be forthcoming is most uncertain." The district's revenue gap could climb to more than $530 million depending on the levels of state aid and whether the district reaches its maximum levels of charter school enrollment, according to one of the sources with knowledge of the budget scenarios.
The district pays charter schools for each student enrolled.
Contact staff writer Kristen Graham at 215-854-5146 or kgraham@phillynews.com.

description.hltext_display: Two questionable executive picks (350)
description.content:
As his inauguration nears, Gov.-elect Dan Malloy is rounding out his gubernatorial staff. Last week, he announced Rep. Michael Lawlor, D-East Haven, and Sen. Andrew McDonald, D-Stamford, co-chairs of the legislature's judiciary committee, will take on prominent roles in his administration. Mr. Lawlor, a legislator since 1987, will assume the role of undersecretary for criminal justice policy and planning at the Office of Policy and Management. Mr. McDonald, a longtime personal friend of the governor-elect and a member of the Senate since 2003, will become general counsel to the governor.
Since winning the election, Mr. Malloy has made some solid personnel decisions. These moves, however, are questionable.
Messrs. McDonald and Lawlor are reliably far-left lawmakers best known for advocating a repeal of Connecticut's death-penalty law in 2009. Gov. M. Jodi Rell vetoed it, saying, "There are certain crimes so heinous — so fundamentally revolting to our humanity — that the death penalty is warranted." One of those crimes was the 2007 invasion of the Petit family home, the brutality of which struck such a chord that Mr. Malloy, himself a longtime critic of capital punishment, said he would do nothing to interfere with the execution of convicted killer Steven Hayes (and that of accomplice Joshua Komisarjevsky if he receives the same sentence). Even before the Cheshire murders, Quinnipiac polls consistently showed a majority of Connecticut residents support the death penalty.
Clearly, Messrs. Lawlor and McDonald are out of step with their constituents on an issue that has taken on a new sense of importance.
As if that weren't enough, in March 2008, Messrs. McDonald and Lawlor opposed a proposed three-strikes law that would have required an automatic life sentence for criminals convicted of a third violent felony.
There have been problems associated with three-strikes laws in the past. For example, states that have mandated a life sentence for anyone convicted of any three felonies have experienced prison crowding. Mr. Lawlor, however, called the 2008 legislation "misleading" and said he objected because prosecutors assured him and other lawmakers the law rarely would be invoked.
Then in early 2009, Messrs. McDonald and Lawlor came under fire from the Roman Catholic Church, for their committee's outrageous efforts to pass a bill requiring more state oversight of the finances of Catholic parishes. The bill was ultimately scuttled, but not before Messrs. McDonald and Lawlor faced protests, angry e-mails and even death threats.
The Constitution prohibits the government from establishing a religion. The Judiciary Committee's work in 2009, while not directly violating this principle, clearly would have given the impression the state was picking on a certain religion.
Mr. Malloy may interpret his narrow win as a green-light to push to the left. However, he should keep in mind that the people of Connecticut are known for independent thinking, as evidenced by registered independents outnumbering registered Democrats and Republicans, and the failure by recent popular governors to carry the state for their party's presidential nominee. This being said, he is taking a risk by empowering two men so consistently out of touch with the people.
More Stories About: Malloy

The following are comments from online readers like you. In no way do they represent the view of The Republican-American.

description.hltext_display: Fed extends program to ease Europe debt crisis
description.author: JEANNINE AVERSA
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- The Federal Reserve extended a program set up earlier this year to ease strains from the European debt crisis.
The program, which was set to expire in January, will now run through Aug. 1, the Fed announced on Tuesday.
The Fed is lending dollars to other central banks in exchange for their currencies. The central banks can lend those dollars out to banks in their home countries to ease financial turmoil.
The Fed's "swap" program was set up in May as fears rose that Greece's debt crisis could engulf other European countries. European banks need dollars to lend to companies across the continent. European companies that have operations in the U.S. pay their employees in dollars and buy raw materials with the U.S. currency.
The Bank of Canada, the Bank of England, the European Central Bank, the Bank of Japan, and the Swiss National Bank all have swap arrangements with the Fed.
"The reality is Europe isn't out of the woods yet. This extends a tool to central banks if they need it," said Nariman Behravesh, chief economist at IHS Global Insight.
Use of the program peaked in May, shortly after the swap arrangements were set up. The Fed had lent the European Central Bank $9.2 billion, and was repaid.
In June, the Fed had lent $6.64 billion through the program. Most of the money went to the European Central Bank, and was repaid. Use of the program has since waned. As of early December, the Fed lent only $60 million to the European Central Bank.
However, the debt crisis has spread from Greece to engulf Ireland, which required a $90 billion bailout in late November from the European Union and International Monetary Fund. The crisis threatens other European countries, including Spain and Portugal.

event_or_fact.property: The reality is Europe isn't out of the woods yet.; This extends a tool to central banks if they need it

description.hltext_display: 锐界 强势登陆云南万福-生活新报网
description.content:
福特全新进口SUV
锐界 强势登陆云南万福
在几乎所有汽车的宣传中，都会提到一个词，那就是?力量?。但是几乎所有的人都把力量简单地定义为动力，并理所当然地用马力来衡量它的大小。事实上，这种理解是片面的。
真正的力量来自内心
福特Edge大胆地把首战选定在全球豪华车竞争最为激烈的美国市场，当这款车来到中国之后，确定其中文名为?锐界?。这一行为本身已经说明了福特锐界来自内心的力量??敢于挑战最强者。锐界成长的每一步，都蕴含着完美与力量的结合，散发着精神层面的光辉，这份情感流淌出来，让驾乘者获得了最真切的感触，释放出内心深处的潜能。
由内而外的强者风范
新一代福特锐界搭载3.5L Ti-VCT V6发动机，AWD智能全时四轮驱动，为驾驭者带来无与伦比的强劲动力，配以6速Select shift自动变速器，有效降低了油耗，实现了真正意义上的绿色驾驶。
与外观上的小改相比，新一代锐界内部环境则完全颠覆，整体变得更加时尚，更加符合时下的流行设计趋势，采用全景天窗，悬浮式中控台，舒适照明系统，加上更具魅力的质感内饰，卓越品质与优雅齐驱，足以升级您高人一格的品位。
锐界亮相云南万福
福特精彩家族，全新进口SUV-福特锐界，现已正式登陆中国，福特云南万福4S店荣登福特（中国）进口车云南唯一指定运营商。记者从云南万福4S店获悉，福特锐界的官方指导售价为36.98万元-42.98万元，车型已经陆续到店并接受预订，意向客户可莅临该店品鉴试驾。
此消息一经传出，连日来，万福4S店内掀起了一轮又一轮的赏车热潮，前来看车询价和预订车型的客户络绎不绝。经过多天的试驾体验，意向客户除了对车辆外观和配置的由衷喜好外，还对车辆的动力输出和经济油耗颇为赞赏，李先生驾驶万福提供的福特锐界试驾车进行了测试，高速行驶百公里油耗仅为10.3L，市区行驶百公里油耗仅为13.6L，再次改变了人们对美系SUV车型的高油耗认识误区。
随着福特锐界在云南的成功上市，销售订单正与日俱增。据万福销售人员介绍：?我们已经看到了这款美式SUV的非凡魅力，也相信福特品牌在面对市场、面对挑战时拥有的信心和能量。?锐行天下，感受非凡，让我们一起期待全新福特锐界在云南市场的精彩表现！
